GE09ram_05_u:001.003a: dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran
GE09ram_05_u:001.003c: mṛgāṃś ca subahūn nighnan pravṛddha iva kesarī
GE09ram_05_u:001.006c: tiṣṭhan kapivaras tatra hrade nāga ivābabhau
GE09ram_05_u:001.007c: bhūtebhyaś cāñjaliṃ kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim
GE09ram_05_u:001.008c: tato hi vavṛdhe gantuṃ dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_05_u:001.010c: bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyāṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_05_u:001.012c: sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ śailo babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:001.013c: salilaṃ saṃprasusrāva madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.014a: pīḍyamānas tu balinā mahendras tena parvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.014e: mumoca ca śilāḥ śailo viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.016c: pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa diśaś copavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:001.017c: vamantaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ dadaṃśur daśanaiḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.018a: tās tadā saviṣair daṣṭāḥ kupitais tair mahāśilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.019c: viṣaghnāny api nāgānāṃ na śekuḥ śamituṃ viṣam
GE09ram_05_u:001.020a: bhidyate 'yaṃ girir bhūtair iti matvā tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.020c: trastā vidyādharās tasmād utpetuḥ strīgaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:001.021c: pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakāṃś ca hiraṇmayān
GE09ram_05_u:001.022a: lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:001.022c: ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgāṃś ca kanakatsarūn
GE09ram_05_u:001.024c: vismitāḥ sasmitās tasthur ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:001.025c: sahitās tasthur ākāśe vīkṣāṃ cakruś ca parvatam
GE09ram_05_u:001.026a: śuśruvuś ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:001.028a: rāmārthaṃ vānarārthaṃ ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:001.028c: samudrasya paraṃ pāraṃ duṣprāpaṃ prāptum icchati
GE09ram_05_u:001.029a: dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe cācalopamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.029c: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ sumahān iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.030a: ānupūrvyāc ca vṛttaṃ ca lāṅgūlaṃ romabhiś citam
GE09ram_05_u:001.032c: sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyāṃ caraṇau saṃcukopa ca
GE09ram_05_u:001.033a: saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca śirodharām
GE09ram_05_u:001.033c: tejaḥ sattvaṃ tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:001.035a: padbhyāṃ dṛḍham avasthānaṃ kṛtvā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.037a: na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tāṃ laṅkāyāṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:001.038a: yadi vā tridive sītāṃ na drakṣyāmi
GE09ram_05_u:001.041a: samutpatati tasmiṃs tu vegāt te nagarohiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.043c: prasthitaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ svabandhum iva bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.048a: vimuktās tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.053a: pibann iva babhau cāpi sormijālaṃ mahārṇavam
GE09ram_05_u:001.053c: pipāsur iva cākāśaṃ dadṛśe sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.056a: mukhaṃ nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau
GE09ram_05_u:001.061c: dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.063c: sāgare mārutāviṣṭā naur ivāsīt tadā kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.064a: yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya jagāma sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.064c: sa sa tasyāṅgavegena sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:001.065c: abhighnaṃs tu mahāvegaḥ pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.066a: kapivātaś ca balavān meghavātaś ca niḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.068c: vyomni taṃ kapiśārdūlaṃ suparṇam iti menire
GE09ram_05_u:001.071a: plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā plavagaṃ tvaritaṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:001.072a: tatāpa na hi taṃ sūryaḥ plavantaṃ vānareśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:001.074a: nāgāś ca tuṣṭuvur yakṣā rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.078a: tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ viśrameta yathā kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.079a: iti kṛtvā matiṃ sādhvīṃ samudraś channam ambhasi
GE09ram_05_u:001.082a: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva śaktis te śailavardhitum
GE09ram_05_u:001.083a: sa eṣa kapiśārdūlas tvām uparyeti vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:001.084c: mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ paraṃ pūjyatamās tava
GE09ram_05_u:001.085a: kuru sācivyam asmākaṃ na naḥ kāryam atikramet
GE09ram_05_u:001.085c: kartavyam akṛtaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ manyum udīrayet
GE09ram_05_u:001.086a: salilād ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatv eṣa kapis tvayi
GE09ram_05_u:001.086c: asmākam atithiś caiva pūjyaś ca plavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.087c: hanūmāṃs tvayi viśrāntas tataḥ śeṣaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:001.094a: tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agrataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:001.095a: sa tam ucchritam atyarthaṃ mahāvego mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.095c: urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.096a: sa tadā pātitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.096c: buddhvā tasya kaper vegaṃ jaharṣa ca nananda ca
GE09ram_05_u:001.097c: prīto hṛṣṭamanā vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:001.097e: mānuṣaṃ dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.098a: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān karma tvam idaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:001.099c: sa tvāṃ rāmahite yuktaṃ pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.100a: kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.100c: so 'yaṃ tat pratikārārthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE09ram_05_u:001.101c: yojanānāṃ śataṃ cāpi kapir eṣa samāplutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.101e: tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣaṃ prakramatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:001.102a: tiṣṭha tvaṃ hariśārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām
GE09ram_05_u:001.102c: tad idaṃ gandhavat svādu kandamūlaphalaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:001.103a: asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhyas tvayāsti vai
GE09ram_05_u:001.104c: teṣāṃ mukhyatamaṃ manye tvām ahaṃ kapikuñjara
GE09ram_05_u:001.105c: dharmaṃ jijñāsamānena kiṃ punar yādṛśo bhavān
GE09ram_05_u:001.107a: pūjite tvayi dharmajña pūjāṃ prāpnoti mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.107c: tasmāt tvaṃ pūjanīyo me śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:001.109c: bhūtāni ca bhayaṃ jagmus teṣāṃ patanaśaṅkayā
GE09ram_05_u:001.110c: pakṣāṃś ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.111a: sa mām upagataḥ kruddho vajram udyamya devarāṭ
GE09ram_05_u:001.113a: tato 'haṃ mānayāmi tvāṃ mānyo hi mama mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.113c: tvayā me hy eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhya mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.114a: asminn evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mamaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:001.114c: prītiṃ prītamanā kartuṃ tvam arhasi mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:001.115a: śramaṃ mokṣaya pūjāṃ ca gṛhāṇa kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:001.115c: prītiṃ ca bahumanyasva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt
GE09ram_05_u:001.116a: evam uktaḥ kapiśreṣṭhas taṃ nagottamam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:001.117a: tvarate kāryakālo me ahaś cāpy ativartate
GE09ram_05_u:001.117c: pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam ihāntarā
GE09ram_05_u:001.118a: ity uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.121a: bhūyaś cordhvagatiṃ prāpya giriṃ tam avalokayan
GE09ram_05_u:001.122a: tad dvitīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:001.122c: praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.123a: devatāś cābhavan hṛṣṭās tatrasthās tasya karmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:001.125c: abhayaṃ te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_05_u:001.126a: sāhyaṃ kṛtaṃ te sumahad vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.127a: rāmasyaiṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśarather hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.127c: satkriyāṃ kurvatā śakyā toṣito 'smi dṛḍhaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:001.129a: sa vai dattavaraḥ śailo babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:001.130a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.131c: hanūmān nāma tasya tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ vighnam ācara
GE09ram_05_u:001.133a: balam icchāmahe jñātuṃ bhūyaś cāsya parākramam
GE09ram_05_u:001.133c: tvāṃ vijeṣyaty upāyena viṣadaṃ vā gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:001.134a: evam uktā tu sā devī daivatair abhisatkṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:001.135a: vikṛtaṃ ca virūpaṃ ca sarvasya ca bhayāvaham
GE09ram_05_u:001.136a: mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam īśvarair vānararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:001.138c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:001.139c: tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:001.141a: atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_05_u:001.141c: āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_05_u:001.142c: abravīn nātivarten māṃ kaś cid eṣa varo mama
GE09ram_05_u:001.143c: abravīt kuru vai vaktraṃ yena māṃ viṣahiṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:001.144a: ity uktvā surasāṃ kruddho daśayojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.146a: hanumāṃs tu tataḥ kruddhas triṃśadyojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.150a: tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān
GE09ram_05_u:001.151a: sa saṃkṣipyātmanaḥ kāyaṃ jīmūta iva mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.152a: so 'bhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ niṣpatya ca mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.152c: antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:001.153a: praviṣṭo 'smi hi te vaktraṃ dākṣāyaṇi namo 'stu te
GE09ram_05_u:001.153c: gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyaṃ cāstu vacas tava
GE09ram_05_u:001.154a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanān muktaṃ candraṃ rāhumukhād iva
GE09ram_05_u:001.154c: abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:001.156a: tat tṛtīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:001.156c: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsus tadā harim
GE09ram_05_u:001.165a: praviśann abhrajālāni niṣpataṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.166a: plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_05_u:001.167a: adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmy aham āśitā
GE09ram_05_u:001.167c: idaṃ hi me mahat sattvaṃ cirasya vaśam āgatam
GE09ram_05_u:001.168a: iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat
GE09ram_05_u:001.170a: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva vīkṣamāṇas tataḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.171c: chāyāgrāhi mahāvīryaṃ tad idaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.172a: sa tāṃ buddhvārthatattvena siṃhikāṃ matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.173a: tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.174a: sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vikṛtaṃ sumahan mukham
GE09ram_05_u:001.174c: kāyamātraṃ ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.175a: sa tasyā vivṛte vaktre vajrasaṃhananaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.176c: grasyamānaṃ yathā candraṃ pūrṇaṃ parvaṇi rāhuṇā
GE09ram_05_u:001.177a: tatas tasya nakhais tīkṣṇair marmāṇy utkṛtya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.178a: tāṃ hatāṃ vānareṇāśu patitāṃ vīkṣya siṃhikām
GE09ram_05_u:001.179a: bhīmam adya kṛtaṃ karma mahat sattvaṃ tvayā hatam
GE09ram_05_u:001.180a: yasya tv etāni catvāri vānarendra yathā tava
GE09ram_05_u:001.180c: dhṛtir dṛṣṭir matir dākṣyaṃ sa karmasu na sīdati
GE09ram_05_u:001.184c: sāgarasya ca patnīnāṃ mukhāny api vilokayan
GE09ram_05_u:001.186a: kāyavṛddhiṃ pravegaṃ ca mama dṛṣṭvaiva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.186c: mayi kautūhalaṃ kuryur iti mene mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:001.189a: tataḥ sa lambasya gireḥ samṛddhe; vicitrakūṭe nipapāta kūṭe
GE09ram_05_u:001.190a: sa sāgaraṃ dānavapannagāyutaṃ; balena vikramya mahormimālinam
GE09ram_05_u:001.190c: nipatya tīre ca mahodadhes tadā; dadarśa laṅkām amarāvatīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:002.001c: trikūṭaśikhare laṅkāṃ sthitāṃ svastho dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:002.002c: abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitas tatra babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:002.003c: aniśvasan kapis tatra na glānim adhigacchati
GE09ram_05_u:002.004a: śatāny ahaṃ yojanānāṃ krameyaṃ subahūny api
GE09ram_05_u:002.005a: sa tu vīryavatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api cottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.006a: śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:002.006c: gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca
GE09ram_05_u:002.007a: śailāṃś ca tarusaṃchannān vanarājīś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.008a: sa tasminn acale tiṣṭhan vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:002.008c: sa nagāgre ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.009a: saralān karṇikārāṃś ca kharjūrāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:002.009c: priyālān muculindāṃś ca kuṭajān ketakān api
GE09ram_05_u:002.010a: priyaṅgūn gandhapūrṇāṃś ca nīpān saptacchadāṃs tathā
GE09ram_05_u:002.010c: asanān kovidārāṃś ca karavīrāṃś ca puṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:002.012c: ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhāṃś ca jalāśayān
GE09ram_05_u:002.017c: dadarśa hanumāṃl laṅkāṃ divi devapurīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:002.018a: girimūrdhni sthitāṃ laṅkāṃ pāṇḍurair bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.018c: dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:002.020a: saṃpūrṇāṃ rākṣasair ghorair nāgair bhogavatīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:002.021c: rakṣitāṃ rākṣasair ghorair guhām āśīviṣair api
GE09ram_05_u:002.023a: dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.024a: tasyāś ca mahatīṃ guptiṃ sāgaraṃ ca nirīkṣya saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.024c: rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ ghoraṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.025c: na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetuṃ surair api
GE09ram_05_u:002.026a: imāṃ tu viṣamāṃ durgāṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām
GE09ram_05_u:002.026c: prāpyāpi sa mahābāhuḥ kiṃ kariṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.027c: na dānasya na bhedasya naiva yuddhasya dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:002.028a: caturṇām eva hi gatir vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:002.028c: vāliputrasya nīlasya mama rājñaś ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.029a: yāvaj jānāmi vaidehīṃ yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_05_u:002.030a: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.031a: anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasāṃ purī
GE09ram_05_u:002.033a: lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā
GE09ram_05_u:002.033c: praveṣṭuṃ prāptakālaṃ me kṛtyaṃ sādhayituṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:002.034a: tāṃ purīṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.034c: hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.036a: na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.036c: ekām ekaś ca paśyeyaṃ rahite janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:002.037c: viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_05_u:002.039a: na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:002.039c: laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:002.040a: mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhī rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.040c: bhaved vyartham idaṃ kāryaṃ rāvaṇānartham icchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.041a: na hi śakyaṃ kva cit sthātum avijñātena rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.041c: api rākṣasarūpeṇa kim utānyena kena cit
GE09ram_05_u:002.042a: vāyur apy atra nājñātaś cared iti matir mama
GE09ram_05_u:002.042c: na hy asty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām
GE09ram_05_u:002.043a: ihāhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.043c: vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartur arthaś ca hīyate
GE09ram_05_u:002.044a: tad ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa rajanyāṃ hrasvatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.050c: talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāny atra rakṣasām
GE09ram_05_u:002.052c: āsīd viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:002.054a: candro 'pi sācivyam ivāsya kurvaṃs; tārāgaṇair madhyagato virājan
GE09ram_05_u:002.055c: dadarśa candraṃ sa kapipravīraḥ; poplūyamānaṃ sarasīva haṃsaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:003.012c: kham ivotpatitāṃ laṅkāṃ jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.013a: tāṃ samīkṣya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rākṣasādhipateḥ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:003.014a: neyam anyena nagarī śakyā dharṣayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_05_u:003.016c: ṛkṣasya ketumālasya mama caiva gatir bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:003.017c: lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.019a: tāṃ naṣṭatimirāṃ dīpair bhāsvaraiś ca mahāgṛhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.021e: gṛhamedhaiḥ purī ramyā babhāse dyaur ivāmbudaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.023c: rāghavārthaṃ carañ śrīmān dadarśa ca nananda ca
GE09ram_05_u:003.025e: āsphoṭitaninādāṃś ca kṣveḍitāṃś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.026a: svādhyāya niratāṃś caiva yātudhānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.027c: dadarśa madhyame gulme rākṣasasya carān bahūn
GE09ram_05_u:003.030a: karālān bhugnavaktrāṃś ca vikaṭān vāmanāṃs tathā
GE09ram_05_u:003.031c: virūpān bahurūpāṃś ca surūpāṃś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:003.036a: rathair yānair vimānaiś ca tathā gajahayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.001a: tataḥ sa madhyaṃ gatam aṃśumantaṃ; jyotsnāvitānaṃ mahad udvamantam
GE09ram_05_u:004.001c: dadarśa dhīmān divi bhānumantaṃ; goṣṭhe vṛṣaṃ mattam iva bhramantam
GE09ram_05_u:004.002a: lokasya pāpāni vināśayantaṃ; mahodadhiṃ cāpi samedhayantam
GE09ram_05_u:004.002c: bhūtāni sarvāṇi virājayantaṃ; dadarśa śītāṃśum athābhiyāntam
GE09ram_05_u:004.003a: yā bhāti lakṣmīr bhuvi mandarasthā; tathā pradoṣeṣu ca sāgarasthā
GE09ram_05_u:004.003c: tathaiva toyeṣu ca puṣkarasthā; rarāja sā cāruniśākarasthā
GE09ram_05_u:004.004a: haṃso yathā rājatapañjurasthaḥ; siṃho yathā mandarakandarasthaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.004c: vīro yathā garvitakuñjarasthaś; candro 'pi babhrāja tathāmbarasthaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.005a: sthitaḥ kakudmān iva tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo; mahācalaḥ śveta ivoccaśṛṅgaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.007a: tantrī svanāḥ karṇasukhāḥ pravṛttāḥ; svapanti nāryaḥ patibhiḥ suvṛttāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.007c: naktaṃcarāś cāpi tathā pravṛttā; vihartum atyadbhutaraudravṛttāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.008c: vīraśriyā cāpi samākulāni; dadarśa dhīmān sa kapiḥ kulāni
GE09ram_05_u:004.009a: parasparaṃ cādhikam ākṣipanti; bhujāṃś ca pīnān adhivikṣipanti
GE09ram_05_u:004.010a: rakṣāṃsi vakṣāṃsi ca vikṣipanti; gātrāṇi kāntāsu ca vikṣipanti
GE09ram_05_u:004.010c: dadarśa kāntāś ca samālapanti; tathāparās tatra punaḥ svapanti
GE09ram_05_u:004.011a: mahāgajaiś cāpi tathā nadadbhiḥ; sūpūjitaiś cāpi tathā susadbhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.011c: rarāja vīraiś ca viniḥśvasadbhir; hrado bhujaṅgair iva niḥśvasadbhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.012c: nānāvidhānān rucirābhidhānān; dadarśa tasyāṃ puri yātudhānān
GE09ram_05_u:004.013a: nananda dṛṣṭvā sa ca tān surūpān; nānāguṇān ātmaguṇānurūpān
GE09ram_05_u:004.013c: vidyotamānān sa ca tān surūpān; dadarśa kāṃś cic ca punar virūpān
GE09ram_05_u:004.014a: tato varārhāḥ suviśuddhabhāvās; teṣāṃ striyas tatra mahānubhāvāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.014c: priyeṣu pāneṣu ca saktabhāvā; dadarśa tārā iva suprabhāvāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.015c: dadarśa kāś cit pramadopagūḍhā; yathā vihaṃgāḥ kusumopagūḍāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.016a: anyāḥ punar harmyatalopaviṣṭās; tatra priyāṅkeṣu sukhopaviṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.016c: bhartuḥ priyā dharmaparā niviṣṭā; dadarśa dhīmān manadābhiviṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.017a: aprāvṛtāḥ kāñcanarājivarṇāḥ; kāś cit parārdhyās tapanīyavarṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.017c: punaś ca kāś cic chaśalakṣmavarṇāḥ; kāntaprahīṇā rucirāṅgavarṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.018a: tataḥ priyān prāpya mano'bhirāmān; suprītiyuktāḥ prasamīkṣya rāmāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.018c: gṛheṣu hṛṣṭāḥ paramābhirāmā; haripravīraḥ sa dadarśa rāmāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.019a: candraprakāśāś ca hi vaktramālā; vakrākṣipakṣmāś ca sunetramālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.019c: vibhūṣaṇānāṃ ca dadarśa mālāḥ; śatahradānām iva cārumālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:004.020a: na tv eva sītāṃ paramābhijātāṃ; pathi sthite rājakule prajātām
GE09ram_05_u:004.020c: latāṃ praphullām iva sādhujātāṃ; dadarśa tanvīṃ manasābhijātām
GE09ram_05_u:004.021a: sanātane vartmani saṃniviṣṭāṃ; rāmekṣaṇīṃ tāṃ madanābhiviṣṭām
GE09ram_05_u:004.021c: bhartur manaḥ śrīmad anupraviṣṭāṃ; strībhyo varābhyaś ca sadā viśiṣṭām
GE09ram_05_u:004.022c: sujātapakṣmām abhiraktakaṇṭhīṃ; vane pravṛttām iva nīlakaṇṭhīm
GE09ram_05_u:004.023a: avyaktalekhām iva candralekhāṃ; pāṃsupradigdhām iva hemalekhām
GE09ram_05_u:004.023c: kṣataprarūḍhām iva bāṇalekhāṃ; vāyuprabhinnām iva meghalekhām
GE09ram_05_u:004.024a: sītām apaśyan manujeśvarasya; rāmasya patnīṃ vadatāṃ varasya
GE09ram_05_u:004.024c: babhūva duḥkhābhihataś cirasya; plavaṃgamo manda ivācirasya
GE09ram_05_u:005.003a: rakṣitaṃ rākṣasair bhīmaiḥ siṃhair iva mahad vanam
GE09ram_05_u:005.004c: vicitrābhiś ca kakṣyābhir dvāraiś ca rucirair vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:005.006c: ghoṣavadbhir vicitraiś ca sadā vicaritaṃ rathaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.008a: dṛśyaiś ca paramodārais tais taiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.009a: vinītair antapālaiś ca rakṣobhiś ca surakṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:005.012c: samudram iva gambhīraṃ samudram iva niḥsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:005.015a: gṛhād gṛhaṃ rākṣasānām udyānāni ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.015c: vīkṣamāṇo hy asaṃtrastaḥ prāsādāṃś ca cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.017c: vibhīṣaṇasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.018a: mahodarasya ca tathā virūpākṣasya caiva hi
GE09ram_05_u:005.018e: vajradaṃṣṭrasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.019a: śukasya ca mahāvegaḥ sāraṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.020c: raśmiketoś ca bhavanaṃ sūryaśatros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:005.025c: teṣām ṛddhimatām ṛddhiṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.028a: dadarśa vividhān gulmāṃs tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_05_u:005.029a: raktāñ śvetān sitāṃś caiva harīṃś caiva mahājavān
GE09ram_05_u:005.030c: nihantṝn parasainyānāṃ gṛhe tasmin dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.031a: kṣarataś ca yathā meghān sravataś ca yathā girīn
GE09ram_05_u:005.035a: kāmasya gṛhakaṃ ramyaṃ divāgṛhakam eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:005.038a: arcirbhiś cāpi ratnānāṃ tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:005.038c: virarājātha tad veśma raśmimān iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:005.041a: nūpurāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa kāñcīnāṃ ninadena ca
GE09ram_05_u:006.001c: yathā mahat prāvṛṣi meghajālaṃ; vidyutpinaddhaṃ savihaṃgajālam
GE09ram_05_u:006.002c: manoharāś cāpi punar viśālā; dadarśa veśmādriṣu candraśālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.003c: sarvaiś ca doṣaiḥ parivarjitāni; kapir dadarśa svabalārjitāni
GE09ram_05_u:006.004a: tāni prayatnābhisamāhitāni; mayena sākṣād iva nirmitāni
GE09ram_05_u:006.006a: mahītale svargam iva prakīrṇaṃ; śriyā jvalantaṃ bahuratnakīrṇam
GE09ram_05_u:006.007a: nārīpravekair iva dīpyamānaṃ; taḍidbhir ambhodavad arcyamānam
GE09ram_05_u:006.007c: haṃsapravekair iva vāhyamānaṃ; śriyā yutaṃ khe sukṛtāṃ vimānam
GE09ram_05_u:006.008a: yathā nagāgraṃ bahudhātucitraṃ; yathā nabhaś ca grahacandracitram
GE09ram_05_u:006.009a: mahī kṛtā parvatarājipūrṇā; śailāḥ kṛtā vṛkṣavitānapūrṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.009c: vṛkṣāḥ kṛtāḥ puṣpavitānapūrṇāḥ; puṣpaṃ kṛtaṃ kesarapatrapūrṇam
GE09ram_05_u:006.010a: kṛtāni veśmāni ca pāṇḍurāṇi; tathā supuṣpā api puṣkariṇyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.010c: punaś ca padmāni sakesarāṇi; dhanyāni citrāṇi tathā vanāni
GE09ram_05_u:006.011a: puṣpāhvayaṃ nāma virājamānaṃ; ratnaprabhābhiś ca vivardhamānam
GE09ram_05_u:006.011c: veśmottamānām api coccamānaṃ; mahākapis tatra mahāvimānam
GE09ram_05_u:006.012a: kṛtāś ca vaidūryamayā vihaṃgā; rūpyapravālaiś ca tathā vihaṃgāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.012c: citrāś ca nānāvasubhir bhujaṃgā; jātyānurūpās turagāḥ śubhāṅgāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.013c: kāmasya sākṣād iva bhānti pakṣāḥ; kṛtā vihaṃgāḥ sumukhāḥ supakṣāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.014a: niyujyamānāś ca gajāḥ suhastāḥ; sakesarāś cotpalapatrahastāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.014c: babhūva devī ca kṛtā suhastā; lakṣmīs tathā padmini padmahastā
GE09ram_05_u:006.015a: itīva tad gṛham abhigamya śobhanaṃ; savismayo nagam iva cāruśobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:006.015c: punaś ca tat paramasugandhi sundaraṃ; himātyaye nagam iva cārukandaram
GE09ram_05_u:006.016a: tataḥ sa tāṃ kapir abhipatya pūjitāṃ; caran purīṃ daśamukhabāhupālitām
GE09ram_05_u:006.016c: adṛśya tāṃ janakasutāṃ supūjitāṃ; suduḥkhitāṃ patiguṇaveganirjitām
GE09ram_05_u:006.017a: tatas tadā bahuvidhabhāvitātmanaḥ; kṛtātmano janakasutāṃ suvartmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:006.017c: apaśyato 'bhavad atiduḥkhitaṃ manaḥ; sucakṣuṣaḥ pravicarato mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.007a: yā hi vaiśvaraṇe lakṣmīr yā cendre harivāhane
GE09ram_05_u:007.008a: yā ca rājñaḥ kuberasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:007.008c: tādṛśī tad viśiṣṭā vā ṛddhī rakṣo gṛheṣv iha
GE09ram_05_u:007.009a: tasya harmyasya madhyasthaṃ veśma cānyat sunirmitam
GE09ram_05_u:007.010a: brahmaṇo 'rthe kṛtaṃ divyaṃ divi yad viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:007.011a: pareṇa tapasā lebhe yat kuberaḥ pitāmahāt
GE09ram_05_u:007.011c: kuberam ojasā jitvā lebhe tad rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.012c: sukṛtair ācitaṃ stambhaiḥ pradīptam iva ca śriyā
GE09ram_05_u:007.017a: sa gandhas taṃ mahāsattvaṃ bandhur bandhum ivottamam
GE09ram_05_u:007.017c: ita ehīty uvāceva tatra yatra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.018a: tatas tāṃ prasthitaḥ śālāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:007.020a: muktābhiś ca pravālaiś ca rūpyacāmīkarair api
GE09ram_05_u:007.021c: stambhaiḥ pakṣair ivātyuccair divaṃ saṃprasthitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:007.025c: tāṃ śokanāśinīṃ divyāṃ śriyaḥ saṃjananīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:007.027c: siddhir veyaṃ parā hi syād ity amanyata mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.029a: dīpānāṃ ca prakāśena tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:007.036c: mene hi guṇatas tāni samāni salilodbhavaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.037a: sā tasya śuśubhe śālā tābhiḥ strībhir virājitā
GE09ram_05_u:007.038a: sa ca tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.038c: yathā hy uḍupatiḥ śrīmāṃs tārābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.039c: imās tāḥ saṃgatāḥ kṛtsnā iti mene haris tadā
GE09ram_05_u:007.042a: vyāvṛttatilakāḥ kāś cit kāś cid udbhrāntanūpurāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.042c: pārśve galitahārāś ca kāś cit paramayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.043a: mukhā hāravṛtāś cānyāḥ kāś cit prasrastavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.045a: candrāṃśukiraṇābhāś ca hārāḥ kāsāṃ cid utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.045c: haṃsā iva babhuḥ suptāḥ stanamadhyeṣu yoṣitām
GE09ram_05_u:007.046a: aparāsāṃ ca vaidūryāḥ kādambā iva pakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.047c: āpagā iva tā rejur jaghanaiḥ pulinair iva
GE09ram_05_u:007.049a: mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu kāsāṃ cit kucāgreṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.050c: upary upari vaktrāṇāṃ vyādhūyante punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.052a: vavalguś cātra kāsāṃ cit kuṇḍalāni śubhārciṣām
GE09ram_05_u:007.054c: mukhāni sma sapatnīnām upājighran punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.056c: aṃśukāni ca ramyāṇi pramadās tatra śiśyire
GE09ram_05_u:007.057a: anyā vakṣasi cānyasyās tasyāḥ kā cit punar bhujam
GE09ram_05_u:007.057c: aparā tv aṅkam anyasyās tasyāś cāpy aparā bhujau
GE09ram_05_u:007.062c: āsīd vanam ivoddhūtaṃ strīvanaṃ rāvaṇasya tat
GE09ram_05_u:007.063a: uciteṣv api suvyaktaṃ na tāsāṃ yoṣitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:007.065c: rakṣasāṃ cābhavan kanyās tasya kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.066a: na tatra kā cit pramadā prasahya; vīryopapannena guṇena labdhā
GE09ram_05_u:007.066c: na cānyakāmāpi na cānyapūrvā; vinā varārhāṃ janakātmajāṃ tu
GE09ram_05_u:007.067a: na cākulīnā na ca hīnarūpā; nādakṣiṇā nānupacāra yuktā
GE09ram_05_u:007.067c: bhāryābhavat tasya na hīnasattvā; na cāpi kāntasya na kāmanīyā
GE09ram_05_u:007.068a: babhūva buddhis tu harīśvarasya; yadīdṛśī rāghavadharmapatnī
GE09ram_05_u:007.068c: imā yathā rākṣasarājabhāryāḥ; sujātam asyeti hi sādhubuddheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:007.069a: punaś ca so 'cintayad ārtarūpo; dhruvaṃ viśiṣṭā guṇato hi sītā
GE09ram_05_u:007.069c: athāyam asyāṃ kṛtavān mahātmā; laṅkeśvaraḥ kaṣṭam anāryakarma
GE09ram_05_u:008.003c: gandhaiś ca vividhair juṣṭaṃ varadhūpena dhūpitam
GE09ram_05_u:008.009a: pītvāpy uparataṃ cāpi dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:008.019a: dadarśa sa kapis tasya bāhū śayanasaṃsthitau
GE09ram_05_u:008.022c: śayānasya viniḥśvāsaḥ pūrayann iva tad gṛham
GE09ram_05_u:008.028c: patnīḥ sa priyabhāryasya tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_05_u:008.032c: virarāja vimānaṃ tan nabhas tārāgaṇair iva
GE09ram_05_u:008.034a: kā cid vīṇāṃ pariṣvajya prasuptā saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_05_u:008.037a: kā cid aṃśaṃ pariṣvajya suptā kamalalocanā
GE09ram_05_u:008.043a: pāṇibhyāṃ ca kucau kā cit suvarṇakalaśopamau
GE09ram_05_u:008.045c: nipīḍya ca kucaiḥ suptāḥ kāminyaḥ kāmukān iva
GE09ram_05_u:008.046c: dadarśa rūpasaṃpannām aparāṃ sa kapiḥ striyam
GE09ram_05_u:008.049a: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābāhur bhūṣitāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:008.050a: āshpoṭayām āsa cucumba pucchaṃ; nananda cikrīḍa jagau jagāma
GE09ram_05_u:008.050c: stambhān arohan nipapāta bhūmau; nidarśayan svāṃ prakṛtiṃ kapīnām
GE09ram_05_u:009.001a: avadhūya ca tāṃ buddhiṃ babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:009.001c: jagāma cāparāṃ cintāṃ sītāṃ prati mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.002a: na rāmeṇa viyuktā sā svaptum arhati bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:009.002c: na bhoktuṃ nāpy alaṃkartuṃ na pānam upasevitum
GE09ram_05_u:009.003a: nānyaṃ naram upasthātuṃ surāṇām api ceśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:009.003c: na hi rāmasamaḥ kaś cid vidyate tridaśeṣv api
GE09ram_05_u:009.003e: anyeyam iti niścitya pānabhūmau cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.004a: krīḍitenāparāḥ klāntā gītena ca tathā parāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.008c: goṣṭhe mahati mukhyānāṃ gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.009a: sa rākṣasendraḥ śuśubhe tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:009.011a: mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.011c: tatra nyastāni māṃsāni pānabhūmau dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.014c: mahiṣān ekaśalyāṃś ca chāgāṃś ca kṛtaniṣṭhitān
GE09ram_05_u:009.014e: lekhyam uccāvacaṃ peyaṃ bhojyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:009.017a: tatra tatra ca vinyastaiḥ suśliṣṭaiḥ śayanāsanaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.019a: divyāḥ prasannā vividhāḥ surāḥ kṛtasurā api
GE09ram_05_u:009.019e: vāsacūrṇaiś ca vividhair mṛṣṭās tais taiḥ pṛthakpṛthak
GE09ram_05_u:009.020a: saṃtatā śuśubhe bhūmir mālyaiś ca bahusaṃsthitaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.020c: hiraṇmayaiś ca karakair bhājanaiḥ sphāṭikair api
GE09ram_05_u:009.021c: pānaśreṣṭhaṃ tadā bhūri kapis tatra dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:009.023a: kva cid ardhāvaśeṣāṇi kva cit pītāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.023c: kva cin naiva prapītāni pānāni sa dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:009.024a: kva cid bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kva cit pānāni bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.024c: kva cid annāvaśeṣāṇi paśyan vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:009.025a: kva cit prabhinnaiḥ karakaiḥ kva cid āloḍitair ghaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.025c: kva cit saṃpṛktamālyāni jalāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:009.026a: śayanāny atra nārīṇāṃ śūnyāni bahudhā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.026c: parasparaṃ samāśliṣya kāś cit suptā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.027a: kā cic ca vastram anyasyā apahṛtyopaguhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:009.028a: tāsām ucchvāsavātena vastraṃ mālyaṃ ca gātrajam
GE09ram_05_u:009.028c: nātyarthaṃ spandate citraṃ prāpya mandam ivānilam
GE09ram_05_u:009.029a: candanasya ca śītasya śīdhor madhurasasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:009.029c: vividhasya ca mālyasya puṣpasya vividhasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:009.030a: bahudhā mārutas tatra gandhaṃ vividham udvahan
GE09ram_05_u:009.030c: snānānāṃ candanānāṃ ca dhūpānāṃ caiva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.030e: pravavau surabhir gandho vimāne puṣpake tadā
GE09ram_05_u:009.031a: śyāmāvadātās tatrānyāḥ kāś cit kṛṣṇā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.032c: padminīnāṃ prasuptānāṃ rūpam āsīd yathaiva hi
GE09ram_05_u:009.033c: dadarśa sumahātejā na dadarśa ca jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:009.034a: nirīkṣamāṇaś ca tatas tāḥ striyaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.036a: na hi me paradārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭir viṣayavartinī
GE09ram_05_u:009.038a: kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvā viśvastā rāvaṇastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:009.038c: na tu me manasaḥ kiṃ cid vaikṛtyam upapadyate
GE09ram_05_u:009.039a: mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartate
GE09ram_05_u:009.039c: śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu tac ca me suvyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:009.040a: nānyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum
GE09ram_05_u:009.040c: striyo hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:009.041a: yasya sattvasya yā yonis tasyāṃ tat parimārgyate
GE09ram_05_u:009.041c: na śakyaṃ pramadā naṣṭā mṛgīṣu parimārgitum
GE09ram_05_u:009.042a: tad idaṃ mārgitaṃ tāvac chuddhena manasā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:009.042c: rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ saraṃ dṛśyate na ca jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:009.044a: tām apaśyan kapis tatra paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.001a: sa tasya madhye bhavanasya vānaro; latāgṛhāṃś citragṛhān niśāgṛhān
GE09ram_05_u:010.001c: jagāma sītāṃ prati darśanotsuko; na caiva tāṃ paśyati cārudarśanām
GE09ram_05_u:010.002a: sa cintayām āsa tato mahākapiḥ; priyām apaśyan raghunandanasya tām
GE09ram_05_u:010.002c: dhruvaṃ nu sītā mriyate yathā na me; vicinvato darśanam eti maithilī
GE09ram_05_u:010.003a: sā rākṣasānāṃ pravareṇa bālā; svaśīlasaṃrakṣaṇa tat parā satī
GE09ram_05_u:010.003c: anena nūnaṃ pratiduṣṭakarmaṇā; hatā bhaved āryapathe pare sthitā
GE09ram_05_u:010.004c: samīkṣya sā rākṣasarājayoṣito; bhayād vinaṣṭā janakeśvarātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:010.005a: sītām adṛṣṭvā hy anavāpya pauruṣaṃ; vihṛtya kālaṃ saha vānaraiś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:010.005c: na me 'sti sugrīvasamīpagā gatiḥ; sutīkṣṇadaṇḍo balavāṃś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.006c: na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jāto mama śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.007a: kiṃ nu māṃ vānarāḥ sarve gataṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.007c: gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kiṃ kṛtaṃ tad vadasva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.008a: adṛṣṭvā kiṃ pravakṣyāmi tām ahaṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:010.009a: kiṃ vā vakṣyati vṛddhaś ca jāmbavān aṅgadaś ca saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.009c: gataṃ pāraṃ samudrasya vānarāś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.010a: anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham
GE09ram_05_u:010.010c: bhūyas tāvad viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.011c: karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yac ca karoti saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.012a: tasmād anirveda kṛtaṃ yatnaṃ ceṣṭe 'ham uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:010.013c: citraśālāś ca vicitā bhūyaḥ krīḍāgṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:010.015c: utpatan nipataṃś cāpi tiṣṭhan gacchan punaḥ kva cit
GE09ram_05_u:010.016c: praviśan niṣpataṃś cāpi prapatann utpatann api
GE09ram_05_u:010.016e: sarvam apy avakāśaṃ sa vicacāra mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.017c: rāvaṇāntaḥpure tasmin yaṃ kapir na jagāma saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:010.018c: śvabhrāś ca puṣkariṇyaś ca sarvaṃ tenāvalokitam
GE09ram_05_u:010.019c: dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:010.020c: dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghavanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:010.021c: dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_05_u:010.022c: dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:010.023a: so 'paśyaṃs tāṃ mahābāhuḥ paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.002c: adṛṣṭvā jānakīṃ sītām abravīd vacanaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.003a: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam
GE09ram_05_u:011.003c: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ sītāṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanām
GE09ram_05_u:011.004e: loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:011.005c: ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham
GE09ram_05_u:011.006a: kiṃ nu sītātha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:011.007a: kṣipram utpatato manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.008c: manye patitam āryāyā hṛdayaṃ prekṣya sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:011.009c: tayā manye viśālākṣyā tyaktaṃ jīvitam āryayā
GE09ram_05_u:011.010a: upary upari vā nūnaṃ sāgaraṃ kramatas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:011.011a: āho kṣudreṇa cānena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.013c: rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktraṃ pañcatvaṃ kṛpaṇā gatā
GE09ram_05_u:011.014a: hā rāma lakṣmaṇety eva hāyodhyeti ca maithilī
GE09ram_05_u:011.017a: vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:011.018a: nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syād doṣaḥ syād anivedane
GE09ram_05_u:011.018c: kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyaṃ viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_05_u:011.019a: asminn evaṃgate karye prāptakālaṃ kṣamaṃ ca kim
GE09ram_05_u:011.019c: bhaved iti matiṃ bhūyo hanumān pravicārayan
GE09ram_05_u:011.020c: gamiṣyāmi tataḥ ko me puruṣārtho bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:011.021c: praveśaś civa laṅkāyā rākṣasānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_05_u:011.022a: kiṃ vā vakṣyati sugrīvo harayo va samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.023a: gatvā tu yadi kākutsthaṃ vakṣyāmi param apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:011.023c: na dṛṣṭeti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:011.024c: sītānimittaṃ durvākyaṃ śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:011.026c: bharataṃ ca mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrughno na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:011.027a: putrān mṛtān samīkṣyātha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.027c: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.028c: rāmaṃ tathā gataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:011.032c: śirāṃsy abhihaniṣyanti talair muṣṭibhir eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:011.034a: na vaneṣu na śaileṣu na nirodheṣu vā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.036a: viṣam udbandhanaṃ vāpi praveśaṃ jvalanasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:011.037a: ghoram ārodanaṃ manye gate mayi bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:011.038a: so 'haṃ naiva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīm itaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.038c: na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ maithilīṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:011.039c: āśayā tau dhariṣyete vanarāś ca manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.043a: idam apy ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ niryāṇam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.043c: samyag āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na cet paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:011.046c: aṅgadaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair vānarair na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:011.047a: vināśe bahavo doṣā jīvan prāpnoti bhadrakam
GE09ram_05_u:011.047c: tasmāt prāṇān dhariṣyāmi dhruvo jīvati saṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.048a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ manasā dhārayan muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.049c: kāmam astu hṛtā sītā pratyācīrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:011.051a: iti cintā samāpannaḥ sītām anadhigamya tām
GE09ram_05_u:011.052a: yāvat sītāṃ na paśyāmi rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:011.052c: tāvad etāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vicinomi punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.053a: saṃpāti vacanāc cāpi rāmaṃ yady ānayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:011.054c: na matkṛte vinaśyeyuḥ sarve te naravānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.055c: imām abhigamiṣyāmi na hīyaṃ vicitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:011.056a: vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān aśvinau maruto 'pi ca
GE09ram_05_u:011.059a: namo 'stu rāmāya salakṣmaṇāya; devyai ca tasyai janakātmajāyai
GE09ram_05_u:011.060a: sa tebhyas tu namaskṛtvā sugrīvāya ca mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.061a: sa gatvā manasā pūrvam aśokavanikāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:011.063a: rakṣiṇaś cātra vihitā nūnaṃ rakṣanti pādapān
GE09ram_05_u:011.064a: saṃkṣipto 'yaṃ mayātmā ca rāmārthe rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:011.064c: siddhiṃ me saṃvidhāsyanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tv iha
GE09ram_05_u:011.065a: brahmā svayambhūr bhagavān devāś caiva diśantu me
GE09ram_05_u:011.065c: siddhim agniś ca vāyuś ca puruhūtaś ca vajradhṛt
GE09ram_05_u:011.066a: varuṇaḥ pāśahastaś ca somādityai tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:011.066c: aśvinau ca mahātmānau marutaḥ sarva eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:011.067a: siddhiṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ caiva yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.067c: dāsyanti mama ye cānye adṛṣṭāḥ pathi gocarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:011.068a: tad unnasaṃ pāṇḍuradantam avraṇaṃ; śucismitaṃ padmapalāśalocanam
GE09ram_05_u:011.068c: drakṣye tad āryāvadanaṃ kadā nv ahaṃ; prasannatārādhipatulyadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:011.069c: balābhibhūtā abalā tapasvinī; kathaṃ nu me dṛṣṭapathe 'dya sā bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:012.001a: sa muhūrtam iva dhyatvā manasā cādhigamya tām
GE09ram_05_u:012.003a: sālān aśokān bhavyāṃś ca campakāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:012.005a: sa praviṣya vicitrāṃ tāṃ vihagair abhināditām
GE09ram_05_u:012.012c: dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vasanta iti menire
GE09ram_05_u:012.019a: tathā lāṅgūlahastaiś ca caraṇābhyāṃ ca marditā
GE09ram_05_u:012.021a: sa tatra maṇibhūmīś ca rājatīś ca manoramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.021c: tathā kāñcanabhūmīś ca vicaran dadṛśe kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.029a: dadarśa ca nagāt tasmān nadīṃ nipatitāṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.029c: aṅkād iva samutpatya priyasya patitāṃ priyām
GE09ram_05_u:012.031a: punar āvṛttatoyāṃ ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.031c: prasannām iva kāntasya kāntāṃ punar upasthitām
GE09ram_05_u:012.033a: kṛtrimāṃ dīrghikāṃ cāpi pūrṇāṃ śītena vāriṇā
GE09ram_05_u:012.035a: ye ke cit pādapās tatra puṣpopagaphalopagāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.036a: latāpratānair bahubhiḥ parṇaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:012.036c: kāñcanīṃ śiṃśupām ekāṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.038a: teṣāṃ drumāṇāṃ prabhayā meror iva mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:012.039a: tāṃ kāñcanais tarugaṇair mārutena ca vījitām
GE09ram_05_u:012.041c: itaś cetaś ca duḥkhārtāṃ saṃpatantīṃ yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_05_u:012.042c: campakaiś candanaiś cāpi bakulaiś ca vibhūṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:012.043c: imāṃ sā rāmamahiṣī nūnam eṣyati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:012.044a: sā rāma rāmamahiṣī rāghavasya priyā sadā
GE09ram_05_u:012.047c: rāmasya dayitā bhāryā janakasya sutā satī
GE09ram_05_u:012.049c: śubhā yā pārthivendrasya patnī rāmasya saṃmitā
GE09ram_05_u:012.051a: evaṃ tu matvā hanumān mahātmā; pratīkṣamāṇo manujendrapatnīm
GE09ram_05_u:012.051c: avekṣamāṇaś ca dadarśa sarvaṃ; supuṣpite parṇaghane nilīnaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:013.001a: sa vīkṣamāṇas tatrastho mārgamāṇaś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:013.001c: avekṣamāṇaś ca mahīṃ sarvāṃ tām anvavaikṣata
GE09ram_05_u:013.008c: sa deśaḥ prabhayā teṣāṃ pradīpta iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:013.010a: śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:013.011c: ativṛttam ivācintyaṃ divyaṃ ramyaṃ śriyā vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:013.017a: muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi dyotamānam iva śriyā
GE09ram_05_u:013.025a: tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīm adhikaṃ malināṃ kṛśām
GE09ram_05_u:013.026c: yathārūpā hi dṛṣṭā vai tathārūpeyam aṅganā
GE09ram_05_u:013.027c: kurvantīṃ prabhayā devīṃ sarvā vitimirā diśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:013.029c: bhūmau sutanum āsīnāṃ niyatām iva tāpasīm
GE09ram_05_u:013.031c: tāṃ smṛtīm iva saṃdighdām ṛddhiṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:013.032a: vihatām iva ca śraddhām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:013.032c: sopasargāṃ yathā siddhiṃ buddhiṃ sakaluṣām iva
GE09ram_05_u:013.036a: tasya saṃdidihe buddhir muhuḥ sītāṃ nirīkṣya tu
GE09ram_05_u:013.040a: sukṛtau karṇaveṣṭau ca śvadaṃṣṭrau ca susaṃsthitau
GE09ram_05_u:013.042a: tatra yāny avahīnāni tāny ahaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:013.042c: yāny asyā nāvahīnāni tānīmāni na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:013.043a: pītaṃ kanakapaṭṭābhaṃ srastaṃ tad vasanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_05_u:013.045c: tathā hi nūnaṃ tad varṇaṃ tathā śrīmad yathetarat
GE09ram_05_u:013.046c: pranaṣṭāpi satī yasya manaso na praṇaśyati
GE09ram_05_u:013.047a: iyaṃ sā yat kṛte rāmaś caturbhiḥ paritapyate
GE09ram_05_u:013.048c: patnī naṣṭeti śokena priyeti madanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:013.050a: asyā devyā manas tasmiṃs tasya cāsyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:013.050c: teneyaṃ sa ca dharmātmā muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:013.051a: duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo ya imāṃ mattakāśinīm
GE09ram_05_u:013.051c: sītāṃ vinā mahābāhur muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:013.052a: evaṃ sītāṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ pavanasaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:013.052c: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca taṃ prabhum
GE09ram_05_u:014.001a: praśasya tu praśastavyāṃ sītāṃ tāṃ haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.002c: sītām āśritya tejasvī hanumān vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_05_u:014.003c: yadi sītāpi duḥkhārtā kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.006a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā navahemābhāṃ lokakāntām iva śriyam
GE09ram_05_u:014.006c: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:014.007a: asyā hetor viśālākṣyā hato vālī mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.008a: virādhaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.010a: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye triśirāś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.012a: sāgaraś ca mayā krāntaḥ śrīmān nadanadīpatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.012c: asyā hetor viśālākṣyāḥ purī ceyaṃ nirīkṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:014.013c: asyāḥ kṛte jagac cāpi yuktam ity eva me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.014a: rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu sītā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:014.018c: iyaṃ sā dayitā bhāryā rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:014.020c: yā parāṃ bhajate prītiṃ vane 'pi bhavane yathā
GE09ram_05_u:014.022a: imāṃ tu śīlasaṃpannāṃ draṣṭum icchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.023a: asyā nūnaṃ punar lābhād rāghavaḥ prītim eṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:014.026a: bhartā nāma paraṃ nāryā bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇād api
GE09ram_05_u:014.026c: eṣā hi rahitā tena śobhanārhā na śobhate
GE09ram_05_u:014.027a: duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo hīno yad anayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.028c: sukhārhāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpi vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.029c: sā rākṣasībhir vikṛtekṣaṇābhiḥ; saṃrakṣyate saṃprati vṛkṣamūle
GE09ram_05_u:014.030c: sahacararahiteva cakravākī; janakasutā kṛpaṇāṃ daśāṃ prapannā
GE09ram_05_u:014.031a: asyā hi puṣpāvanatāgraśākhāḥ; śokaṃ dṛḍhaṃ vai janayaty aśokāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.032a: ity evam arthaṃ kapir anvavekṣya; sīteyam ity eva niviṣṭabuddhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:014.032c: saṃśritya tasmin niṣasāda vṛkṣe; balī harīṇām ṛṣabhas tarasvī
GE09ram_05_u:015.001c: prajagāma nabhaś candro haṃso nīlam ivodakam
GE09ram_05_u:015.002a: sācivyam iva kurvan sa prabhayā nirmalaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:015.003c: śokabhārair iva nyastāṃ bhārair nāvam ivāmbhasi
GE09ram_05_u:015.008a: hrasvāṃ dīrghāṃ ca kubjāṃ ca vikaṭāṃ vāmanāṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:015.012a: anāsā atināsāś ca tiryan nāsā vināsikāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:015.018c: tasyādhastāc ca tāṃ devīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:015.020a: kṣīṇapuṇyāṃ cyutāṃ bhūmau tārāṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:015.023c: sītāṃ bhartṛhite yuktām ayuktāṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśe
GE09ram_05_u:015.024c: tābhiḥ parivṛtāṃ tatra sagrahām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_05_u:015.025a: dadarśa hanumān devīṃ latām akusumām iva
GE09ram_05_u:015.025c: sā malena ca digdhāṅgī vapuṣā cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:015.026a: mṛṇālī paṅkadighdeva vibhāti ca na bhāti ca
GE09ram_05_u:015.031a: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mārutiḥ prekṣya maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:015.031c: harṣajāni ca so 'śrūṇi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:015.032a: mumoca hanumāṃs tatra namaś cakre ca rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:015.032c: namaskṛtvā ca rāmāya lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:016.001c: vicinvataś ca vaidehīṃ kiṃ cic cheṣā niśābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:016.005a: bhṛśaṃ niyuktas tasyāṃ ca madanena madotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:016.005c: na sa taṃ rākṣasaḥ kāmaṃ śaśākātmani gūhitum
GE09ram_05_u:016.006a: sa sarvābharaṇair yukto bibhrac chriyam anuttamām
GE09ram_05_u:016.011a: dīpikāḥ kāñcanīḥ kāś cij jagṛhus tatra yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:016.012a: kāñcanair api bhṛṅgārair jahruḥ salilam agrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:016.012c: maṇḍalāgrān asīṃś caiva gṛhyānyāḥ pṛṣṭhato yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:016.013a: kā cid ratnamayīṃ pātrīṃ pūrṇāṃ pānasya bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:016.015c: anujagmuḥ patiṃ vīraṃ ghanaṃ vidyullatā iva
GE09ram_05_u:016.016a: tataḥ kāñcīninādaṃ ca nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:016.024c: tena viśravasaḥ putraḥ sa dṛṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:016.027a: sa tathāpy ugratejāḥ san nirdhūtas tasya tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:017.001a: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle rājaputrī tv aninditā
GE09ram_05_u:017.003a: ūrubhyām udaraṃ chādya bāhubhyāṃ ca payodharau
GE09ram_05_u:017.004c: dadarśa dīnāṃ duḥkhārtaṃ nāvaṃ sannām ivārṇave
GE09ram_05_u:017.005c: chinnāṃ prapatitāṃ bhūmau śākhām iva vanaspateḥ
GE09ram_05_u:017.009c: punaḥ saṃskāram āpannāṃ jātam iva ca duṣkule
GE09ram_05_u:017.010a: sannām iva mahākīrtiṃ śraddhām iva vimānitām
GE09ram_05_u:017.010c: prajñām iva parikṣīṇām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:017.011a: āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:017.011c: dīptām iva diśaṃ kāle pūjām apahṛtām iva
GE09ram_05_u:017.012a: padminīm iva vidhvastāṃ hataśūrāṃ camūm iva
GE09ram_05_u:017.013a: vedīm iva parāmṛṣṭāṃ śāntām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_05_u:017.015c: parayā mṛjayā hīnāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe niśām iva
GE09ram_05_u:017.019a: upavāsena śokena dhyānena ca bhayena ca
GE09ram_05_u:017.021c: anuvratāṃ rāmam atīva maithilīṃ; pralobhayām āsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:018.001a: sa tāṃ parivṛtāṃ dīnāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:018.002c: adarśanam ivātmānaṃ bhayān netuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:018.003a: kāmaye tvāṃ viśālākṣi bahumanyasva māṃ priye
GE09ram_05_u:018.004a: neha ke cin manuṣyā vā rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:018.004c: vyapasarpatu te sīte bhayaṃ mattaḥ samutthitam
GE09ram_05_u:018.005a: svadharme rakṣasāṃ bhīru sarvathaiṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:018.005c: gamanaṃ vā parastrīṇāṃ haraṇaṃ saṃpramathya vā
GE09ram_05_u:018.006a: evaṃ caitad akāmāṃ ca na tvāṃ sprakṣyāmi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:018.006c: kāmaṃ kāmaḥ śarīre me yathākāmaṃ pravartatām
GE09ram_05_u:018.007a: devi neha bhayaṃ kāryaṃ mayi viśvasihi priye
GE09ram_05_u:018.007c: praṇayasva ca tattvena maivaṃ bhūḥ śokalālasā
GE09ram_05_u:018.008c: asthāne 'py upavāsaś ca naitāny aupayikāni te
GE09ram_05_u:018.009a: vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni candanāny agarūṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.009c: vividhāni ca vāsāṃsi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.010a: mahārhāṇi ca pānāni yānāni śayanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.010c: gītaṃ nṛttaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca labha māṃ prāpya maithili
GE09ram_05_u:018.011a: strīratnam asi maivaṃ bhūḥ kuru gātreṣu bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:018.011c: māṃ prāpya tu kathaṃ hi syās tvam anarhā suvigrahe
GE09ram_05_u:018.012c: yad atītaṃ punar naiti srotaḥ śīghram apām iva
GE09ram_05_u:018.013a: tvāṃ kṛtvoparato manye rūpakartā sa viśvakṛt
GE09ram_05_u:018.013c: na hi rūpopamā tv anyā tavāsti śubhadarśane
GE09ram_05_u:018.014c: kaḥ pumān ativarteta sākṣād api pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:018.015a: yad yat paśyāmi te gātraṃ śītāṃśusadṛśānane
GE09ram_05_u:018.015c: tasmiṃs tasmin pṛthuśroṇi cakṣur mama nibadhyate
GE09ram_05_u:018.016a: bhava maithili bhāryā me moham enaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_05_u:018.017c: tāni te bhīru sarvāṇi rājyaṃ caitad ahaṃ ca te
GE09ram_05_u:018.019a: neha paśyāmi loke 'nyaṃ yo me pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:018.019c: paśya me sumahad vīryam apratidvandvam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:018.021a: iccha māṃ kriyatām adya pratikarma tavottamam
GE09ram_05_u:018.021e: sādhu paśyāmi te rūpaṃ saṃyuktaṃ pratikarmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:018.022c: bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathākāmaṃ piba bhīru ramasva ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.022e: yatheṣṭaṃ ca prayaccha tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ vā dhanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.023a: lalasva mayi visrabdhā dhṛṣṭam ājñāpayasva ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.023c: matprabhāvāl lalantyāś ca lalantāṃ bāndhavās tava
GE09ram_05_u:018.024a: ṛddhiṃ mamānupaśya tvaṃ śriyaṃ bhadre yaśaś ca me
GE09ram_05_u:018.025c: vratī sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca śaṅke jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_05_u:018.026a: na hi vaidehi rāmas tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāpy upalapsyate
GE09ram_05_u:018.026c: puro balākair asitair meghair jyotsnām ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:018.027a: na cāpi mama hastāt tvāṃ prāptum arhati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:018.028c: mano harasi me bhīru suparṇaḥ pannagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:018.029c: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sveṣu dāreṣu ratiṃ nopalabhāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:018.030c: yāvantyo mama sarvāsām aiśvaryaṃ kuru jānaki
GE09ram_05_u:018.031c: tās tvāṃ paricariṣyanti śriyam apsaraso yathā
GE09ram_05_u:018.032a: yāni vaiśravaṇe subhru ratnāni ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.032c: tāni lokāṃś ca suśroṇi māṃ ca bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham
GE09ram_05_u:018.033a: na rāmas tapasā devi na balena na vikramaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:018.033c: na dhanena mayā tulyas tejasā yaśasāpi vā
GE09ram_05_u:018.034a: piba vihara ramasva bhuṅkṣva bhogān; dhananicayaṃ pradiśāmi medinīṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:018.034c: mayi lala lalane yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ; tvayi ca sametya lalantu bāndhavās te
GE09ram_05_u:018.035c: kanakavimalahārabhūṣitāṅgī; vihara mayā saha bhīru kānanāni
GE09ram_05_u:019.001a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.001c: ārtā dīnasvarā dīnaṃ pratyuvāca śanair vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.003c: nivartaya mano mattaḥ svajane kriyatāṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.004a: na māṃ prārthayituṃ yuktas tvaṃ siddhim iva pāpakṛt
GE09ram_05_u:019.004c: akāryaṃ na mayā kāryam ekapatnyā vigarhitam
GE09ram_05_u:019.004e: kulaṃ saṃprāptayā puṇyaṃ kule mahati jātayā
GE09ram_05_u:019.005a: evam uktvā tu vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ taṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:019.005c: rākṣasaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā bhūyo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:019.006a: nāham aupayikī bhāryā parabhāryā satī tava
GE09ram_05_u:019.006c: sādhu dharmam avekṣasva sādhu sādhuvrataṃ cara
GE09ram_05_u:019.007a: yathā tava tathānyeṣāṃ rakṣyā dārā niśācara
GE09ram_05_u:019.007c: ātmānam upamāṃ kṛtvā sveṣu dāreṣu ramyatām
GE09ram_05_u:019.009a: iha santo na vā santi sato vā nānuvartase
GE09ram_05_u:019.009c: vaco mithyā praṇītātmā pathyam uktaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.011a: tatheyaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya laṅkā ratnaugha saṃkulā
GE09ram_05_u:019.013a: evaṃ tvāṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ vakṣyanti nikṛtā janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.013c: diṣṭyaitad vyasanaṃ prāpto raudra ity eva harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.014a: śakyā lobhayituṃ nāham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā
GE09ram_05_u:019.015c: kathaṃ nāmopadhāsyāmi bhujam anyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_05_u:019.017a: sādhu rāvaṇa rāmeṇa māṃ samānaya duḥkhitām
GE09ram_05_u:019.018a: mitram aupayikaṃ kartuṃ rāmaḥ sthānaṃ parīpsatā
GE09ram_05_u:019.019a: varjayed vajram utsṛṣṭaṃ varjayed antakaś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:019.019c: tvadvidhaṃ na tu saṃkruddho lokanāthaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.020a: rāmasya dhanuṣaḥ śabdaṃ śroṣyasi tvaṃ mahāsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:019.024a: apaneṣyati māṃ bhartā tvattaḥ śīghram ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.024c: asurebhyaḥ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ viṣṇus tribhir iva kramaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.025c: aśaktena tvayā rakṣaḥ kṛtam etad asādhu vai
GE09ram_05_u:019.026a: āśramaṃ tu tayoḥ śūnyaṃ praviśya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.027a: na hi gandham upāghrāya rāmalakṣmaṇayos tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:019.027c: śakyaṃ saṃdarśane sthātuṃ śunā śārdūlayor iva
GE09ram_05_u:019.028a: tasya te vigrahe tābhyāṃ yugagrahaṇam asthiram
GE09ram_05_u:019.029a: kṣipraṃ tava sa nātho me rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_05_u:019.029c: toyam alpam ivādityaḥ prāṇān ādāsyate śaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.030a: giriṃ kuberasya gato 'thavālayaṃ; sabhāṃ gato vā varuṇasya rājñaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:019.030c: asaṃśayaṃ dāśarather na mokṣyase; mahādrumaḥ kālahato 'śaner iva
GE09ram_05_u:020.002a: yathā yathā sāntvayitā vaśyaḥ strīṇāṃ tathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:020.002c: yathā yathā priyaṃ vaktā paribhūtas tathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:020.003a: saṃniyacchati me krodhaṃ tvayi kāmaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.003c: dravato mārgam āsādya hayān iva susārathiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.004a: vāmaḥ kāmo manuṣyāṇāṃ yasmin kila nibadhyate
GE09ram_05_u:020.004c: jane tasmiṃs tv anukrośaḥ snehaś ca kila jāyate
GE09ram_05_u:020.005a: etasmāt kāraṇān na tāṃ ghatayāmi varānane
GE09ram_05_u:020.006a: paruṣāṇi hi vākyāni yāni yāni bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_05_u:020.006c: teṣu teṣu vadho yuktas tava maithili dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.007a: evam uktvā tu vaidehīṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.008a: dvau māsau rakṣitavyau me yo 'vadhis te mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.008c: tataḥ śayanam āroha mama tvaṃ varavarṇini
GE09ram_05_u:020.009a: dvābhyām ūrdhvaṃ tu māsābhyāṃ bhartāraṃ mām anicchatīm
GE09ram_05_u:020.011c: sītām āśvāsayām āsus tarjitāṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_05_u:020.013a: nūnaṃ na te janaḥ kaś cid asin niḥśreyase sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.013c: nivārayati yo na tvāṃ karmaṇo 'smād vigarhitāt
GE09ram_05_u:020.014a: māṃ hi dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ śacīm iva śacīpateḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.014c: tvadanyas triṣu lokeṣu prārthayen manasāpi kaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.015c: uktavān asi yat pāpaṃ kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:020.016a: yathā dṛptaś ca mātaṅgaḥ śaśaś ca sahitau vane
GE09ram_05_u:020.016c: tathā dviradavad rāmas tvaṃ nīca śaśavat smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.017a: sa tvam ikṣvākunāthaṃ vai kṣipann iha na lajjase
GE09ram_05_u:020.017c: cakṣuṣo viṣayaṃ tasya na tāvad upagacchasi
GE09ram_05_u:020.018a: ime te nayane krūre virūpe kṛṣṇapiṅgale
GE09ram_05_u:020.018c: kṣitau na patite kasmān mām anāryanirīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.019a: tasya dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:020.019c: kathaṃ vyāharato māṃ te na jihvā pāpa śīryate
GE09ram_05_u:020.020c: na tvāṃ kurmi daśagrīva bhasma bhasmārhatejasā
GE09ram_05_u:020.021a: nāpahartum ahaṃ śakyā tasya rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.021c: vidhis tava vadhārthāya vihito nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.022c: apohya rāmaṃ kasmād dhi dāracāuryaṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:020.028c: uvāca rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ bhujaṃga iva niḥśvasan
GE09ram_05_u:020.029c: nāśayāmy aham adya tvāṃ sūryaḥ saṃdhyām ivaujasā
GE09ram_05_u:020.030a: ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.034a: yathā madvaśagā sītā kṣipraṃ bhavati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:020.034c: tathā kuruta rākṣasyaḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ sametya ca
GE09ram_05_u:020.039a: evam uktas tu rākṣasyā samutkṣiptas tato balī
GE09ram_05_u:020.040a: devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca tās tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.041a: sa maithilīṃ dharmaparām avasthitāṃ; pravepamānāṃ paribhartsya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:020.041c: vihāya sītāṃ madanena mohitaḥ; svam eva veśma praviveśa bhāsvaram
GE09ram_05_u:021.001a: ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.001c: saṃdiśya ca tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr nirjagāma ha
GE09ram_05_u:021.002a: niṣkrānte rākṣasendre tu punar antaḥpuraṃ gate
GE09ram_05_u:021.003c: paraṃ paruṣayā vācā vaidehīm idam abruvan
GE09ram_05_u:021.004c: daśagrīvasya bhāryātvaṃ sīte na bahu manyase
GE09ram_05_u:021.005a: tatas tv ekajaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:021.006a: prajāpatīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tu caturtho yaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.006c: mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ pulastya iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.007a: pulastyasya tu tejasvī maharṣir mānasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.008c: tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:021.009a: tato harijaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:021.010a: yena devās trayastriṃśad devarājaś ca nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.010c: tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:021.011c: balino vīryayuktasyā bhāryātvaṃ kiṃ na lapsyase
GE09ram_05_u:021.012a: priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ tyaktvā rājā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.012c: sarvāsāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.014c: nirjitāḥ samare yena sa te pārśvam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.016a: yasya sūryo na tapati bhīto yasya ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:021.016c: na vāti smāyatāpāṅge kiṃ tvaṃ tasya na tiṣṭhasi
GE09ram_05_u:021.017a: puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca taravo mumucur yasya vai bhayāt
GE09ram_05_u:021.017c: śailāś ca subhru pānīyaṃ jaladāś ca yadecchati
GE09ram_05_u:021.018c: kiṃ tvaṃ na kuruṣe buddhiṃ bhāryārthe rāvaṇasya hi
GE09ram_05_u:021.019a: sādhu te tattvato devi kathitaṃ sādhu bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:021.019c: gṛhāṇa susmite vākyam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:022.001c: paruṣaṃ paruṣā nārya ūcus tā vākyam apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:022.003c: pratyāhara mano rāmān na tvaṃ jātu bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:022.004a: mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ taṃ tu rāmam icchasi śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:022.004c: rājyād bhraṣṭam asiddhārthaṃ viklavaṃ tam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:022.006c: naitan manasi vākyaṃ me kilbiṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhati
GE09ram_05_u:022.007a: na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:022.007c: kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.007e: dīno vā rājyahīno vā yo me bhartā sa me guruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.009c: sītāṃ saṃtarjayantīs tā rākṣasīr aśṛṇot kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.012c: sā bāṣpam apamārjantī śiṃśapāṃ tām upāgamat
GE09ram_05_u:022.013a: tatas tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ sītā rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:022.014c: bhartsayāṃ cakrire bhīmā rākṣasyas tāḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.015a: tatas tāṃ vinatā nāma rākṣasī bhīmadarśanā
GE09ram_05_u:022.017a: parituṣṭāsmi bhadraṃ te mānuṣas te kṛto vidhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.017c: mamāpi tu vacaḥ pathyaṃ bruvantyāḥ kuru maithili
GE09ram_05_u:022.018c: vikrāntaṃ rūpavantaṃ ca sureśam iva vāsavam
GE09ram_05_u:022.019c: mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmaṃ tyaktvā rāvaṇam āśraya
GE09ram_05_u:022.020c: adya prabhṛti sarveṣāṃ lokānām īśvarī bhava
GE09ram_05_u:022.020e: agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacīvendrasya śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:022.021a: kiṃ te rāmeṇa vaidehi kṛpaṇena gatāyuṣā
GE09ram_05_u:022.022a: etad uktaṃ ca me vākyaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:022.022c: asmin muhūrte sarvās tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_05_u:022.023c: abravīt kupitā sītāṃ muṣṭim udyamya garjatī
GE09ram_05_u:022.024c: anukrośān mṛdutvāc ca soḍhāni tava maithili
GE09ram_05_u:022.024e: na ca naḥ kuruṣe vākyaṃ hitaṃ kālapuraskṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:022.026a: rāvaṇasya gṛhe rudhā asmābhis tu surakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:022.026c: na tvāṃ śaktaḥ paritrātum api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.028a: bhaja prītiṃ praharṣaṃ ca tyajaitāṃ nityadainyatām
GE09ram_05_u:022.029a: jānāsi hi yathā bhīru strīṇāṃ yauvanam adhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:022.029c: yāvan na te vyatikrāmet tāvat sukham avāpnuhi
GE09ram_05_u:022.031a: strīsahasrāṇi te sapta vaśe sthāsyanti sundari
GE09ram_05_u:022.032a: utpāṭya vā te hṛdayaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:022.032c: yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ na yathāvat kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:022.033c: bhrāmayantī mahac chūlam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:022.034c: rāvaṇena hṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā daurhṛdo me mahān abhūt
GE09ram_05_u:022.035c: antrāṇy api tathā śīrṣaṃ khādeyam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:022.036a: tatas tu praghasā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:022.036c: kaṇṭham asyā nṛśaṃsāyāḥ pīḍayāmaḥ kim āsyate
GE09ram_05_u:022.037a: nivedyatāṃ tato rājñe mānuṣī sā mṛteti ha
GE09ram_05_u:022.037c: nātra kaś cana saṃdehaḥ khādateti sa vakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:022.038a: tatas tv ajāmukhī nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:022.038c: viśasyemāṃ tataḥ sarvān samān kuruta pīlukān
GE09ram_05_u:022.039a: vibhajāma tataḥ sarvā vivādo me na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:022.039c: peyam ānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ mālyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:022.040a: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:022.040c: ajāmukhā yad uktaṃ hi tad eva mama rocate
GE09ram_05_u:023.001a: tathā tāsāṃ vadantīnāṃ paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:023.002a: evam uktā tu vaidehī rākṣasībhir manasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:023.003a: na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:023.003c: kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:023.004c: na śarma lebhe duḥkhārtā rāvaṇena ca tarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:023.006a: sā tv aśokasya vipulāṃ śākhām ālambya puṣpitām
GE09ram_05_u:023.008a: sā vepamānā patitā pravāte kadalī yathā
GE09ram_05_u:023.009a: tasyā sā dīrghavipulā vepantyāḥ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:023.010c: ārtā vyasṛjad aśrūṇi maithilī vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_05_u:023.011a: hā rāmeti ca duḥkhārtā punar hā lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_05_u:023.011c: hā śvaśru mama kausalye hā sumitreti bhāvini
GE09ram_05_u:023.012c: akāle durlabho mṛtyuḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:023.013c: jīvāmi hīnā rāmeṇa muhūrtam api duḥkhitā
GE09ram_05_u:023.015c: sīdāmi khalu śokena kūlaṃ toyahataṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:023.016c: dhanyāḥ paśyanti me nāthaṃ kṛtajñaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_05_u:023.017c: tīṣkṇaṃ viṣam ivāsvādya durlabhaṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:023.018a: kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā pāpaṃ purā dehāntare kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:023.018c: yenedaṃ prāpyate duḥkhaṃ mayā ghoraṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_05_u:023.019a: jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchāmi śokena mahatā vṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:023.019c: rākṣasībhiś ca rakṣantyā rāmo nāsādyate mayā
GE09ram_05_u:023.020a: dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ dhig astu paravaśyatām
GE09ram_05_u:023.020c: na śakyaṃ yat parityaktum ātmacchandena jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:024.005a: na hi me jīvitenārtho naivārthair na ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.005c: vasantyā rākṣasī madhye vinā rāmaṃ mahāratham
GE09ram_05_u:024.006a: dhiṅ mām anāryām asatīṃ yāhaṃ tena vinā kṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:024.007a: kā ca me jīvite śraddhā sukhe vā taṃ priyaṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:024.008a: bhidyatāṃ bhakṣyatāṃ vāpi śarīraṃ visṛjāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:024.008c: na cāpy ahaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhaṃ saheyaṃ priyavarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:024.010a: pratyākhyātaṃ na jānāti nātmānaṃ nātmanaḥ kulam
GE09ram_05_u:024.010c: yo nṛśaṃsa svabhāvena māṃ prārthayitum icchati
GE09ram_05_u:024.011a: chinnā bhinnā vibhaktā vā dīpte vāgnau pradīpitā
GE09ram_05_u:024.011c: rāvaṇaṃ nopatiṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ pralāpena vaś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:024.012a: khyātaḥ prājñaḥ kṛtajñaś ca sānukrośaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.013c: yenaikena nirastāni sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:024.014c: samarthaḥ khalu me bhartā rāvaṇaṃ hantum āhave
GE09ram_05_u:024.015c: raṇe rāmeṇa nihataḥ sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:024.016c: na tu rāghavabāṇānāṃ gatirodhī ha vidyate
GE09ram_05_u:024.017a: kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāmo dṛḍhaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.018a: ihasthāṃ māṃ na jānīte śaṅke lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.018c: jānann api hi tejasvī dharṣaṇāṃ marṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:024.020a: kṛtaṃ karma mahat tena māṃ tadābhyavapadyatā
GE09ram_05_u:024.021a: yadi mām iha jānīyād vartamānāṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.021c: adya bāṇair abhikruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:024.022a: vidhamec ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ śoṣayec ca mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:024.022c: rāvaṇasya ca nīcasya kīrtiṃ nāma ca nāśayet
GE09ram_05_u:024.023c: yathāham evaṃ rudatī tathā bhūyo na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.023e: anviṣya rakṣasāṃ laṅkāṃ kuryād rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.024a: na hi tābhyāṃ ripur dṛṣṭo muhūtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:024.026a: yādṛśāni tu dṛśyante laṅkāyām aśubhāni tu
GE09ram_05_u:024.027a: nūnaṃ laṅkā hate pāpe rāvaṇe rākṣasādhipe
GE09ram_05_u:024.027c: śoṣaṃ yāsyati durdharṣā pramadā vidhavā yathā
GE09ram_05_u:024.029c: śroṣyāmi nacirād eva duḥkhārtānām iha dhvanim
GE09ram_05_u:024.031a: yadi nāma sa śūro māṃ rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.032c: samayo yas tu nirdiṣṭas tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.033a: akāryaṃ ye na jānanti nairṛtāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.033c: adharmāt tu mahotpāto bhaviṣyati hi sāmpratam
GE09ram_05_u:024.035a: sāhaṃ kathaṃ kariṣyāmi taṃ vinā priyadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:024.036a: yadi kaś cit pradātā me viṣasyādya bhaved iha
GE09ram_05_u:024.036c: kṣipraṃ vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyeyaṃ patinā vinā
GE09ram_05_u:024.037a: nājānāj jīvatīṃ rāmaḥ sa māṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.037c: jānantau tau na kuryātāṃ norvyāṃ hi mama mārgaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:024.038a: nūnaṃ mamaiva śokena sa vīro lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.038c: devalokam ito yātas tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:024.039a: dhanyā devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.039c: mama paśyanti ye nāthaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam
GE09ram_05_u:024.040a: atha vā na hi tasyārthe dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.041a: dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdaṃ nāsty apaśyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:024.041c: nāśayanti kṛtaghrās tu na rāmo nāśayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:024.042a: kiṃ nu me na guṇāḥ ke cit kiṃ vā bhāgya kṣayo hi me
GE09ram_05_u:024.042c: yāhaṃ sītā varārheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:024.043a: śreyo me jīvitān martuṃ vihīnā yā mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:024.044a: atha vā nyastaśastrau tau vane mūlaphalāśanau
GE09ram_05_u:024.044c: bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau
GE09ram_05_u:024.046a: sāham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā
GE09ram_05_u:024.046c: na ca me vihito mṛtyur asmin duḥkhe 'pi vartati
GE09ram_05_u:024.047c: jitātmāno mahābhāgā yeṣāṃ na staḥ priyāpriye
GE09ram_05_u:024.048a: priyān na saṃbhaved duḥkham apriyād adhikaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_05_u:024.048c: tābhyāṃ hi ye viyujyante namas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:024.049c: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam
GE09ram_05_u:025.001a: ity uktāḥ sītayā ghoraṃ rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.001c: kāś cij jagmus tad ākhyātuṃ rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.004a: sītāṃ tābhir anāryābhir dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:025.005c: janakasya sutām iṣṭāṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:025.006a: svapno hy adya mayā dṛṣṭo dāruṇo romaharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.006c: rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartur asyā bhavāya ca
GE09ram_05_u:025.007c: sarvā evābruvan bhītās trijaṭāṃ tām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.008a: kathayasva tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'yaṃ kīdṛśo niśi
GE09ram_05_u:025.009a: tāsāṃ śrutvā tu vacanaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ mukhodgatam
GE09ram_05_u:025.011a: svapne cādya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śuklāmbarāvṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:025.011e: rāmeṇa saṃgatā sītā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_05_u:025.012a: rāghavaś ca mayā dṛṣṭaś caturdantaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_05_u:025.016a: tatas tābhyāṃ kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gajottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.016c: sītayā ca viśālākṣyā laṅkāyā upari sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.017e: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:025.018a: vimānāt puṣpakād adya rāvaṇaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_05_u:025.018c: kṛṣyapāṇaḥ striyā dṛṣṭo muṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇāmbaraḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.019c: prayāto dakṣiṇām āśāṃ praviṣṭaḥ kardamaṃ hradam
GE09ram_05_u:025.021c: uṣṭreṇa kumbhakarṇaś ca prayāto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_05_u:025.024a: pītva tailaṃ pranṛttāś ca prahasantyo mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.026c: ghātayet paramāmarṣī sarvaiḥ sārdhaṃ hi rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.028a: tad alaṃ krūravākyair vaḥ sāntvam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:025.028c: abhiyācāma vaidehīm etad dhi mama rocate
GE09ram_05_u:025.029a: yasyā hy evaṃ vidhaḥ svapno duḥkhitāyāḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:025.029c: sā duḥkhair bahubhir muktā priyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE09ram_05_u:025.030a: bhartsitām api yācadhvaṃ rākṣasyaḥ kiṃ vivakṣayā
GE09ram_05_u:025.030c: rāghavād dhi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasānām upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:025.031c: alam eṣā paritrātuṃ rākṣasyo mahato bhayāt
GE09ram_05_u:025.032a: api cāsyā viśālākṣyā na kiṃ cid upalakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:025.032c: viruddham api cāṅgeṣu susūkṣmam api lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:025.033a: chāyā vaiguṇya mātraṃ tu śaṅke duḥkham upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:025.034a: arthasiddhiṃ tu vaidehyāḥ paśyāmy aham upasthitām
GE09ram_05_u:025.035a: nimittabhūtam etat tu śrotum asyā mahat priyam
GE09ram_05_u:025.035c: dṛśyate ca sphurac cakṣuḥ padmapatram ivāyatam
GE09ram_05_u:025.036a: īṣac ca hṛṣito vāsyā dakṣiṇāyā hy adakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:025.036c: akasmād eva vaidehyā bāhur ekaḥ prakampate
GE09ram_05_u:025.038a: pakṣī ca śākhā nilayaṃ praviṣṭaḥ; punaḥ punaś cottamasāntvavādī
GE09ram_05_u:025.038c: sukhāgatāṃ vācam udīrayāṇaḥ; punaḥ punaś codayatīva hṛṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:026.001a: sā rākṣasendrasya vaco niśamya; tad rāvaṇasyāpriyam apriyārtā
GE09ram_05_u:026.001c: sītā vitatrāsa yathā vanānte; siṃhābhipannā gajarājakanyā
GE09ram_05_u:026.002a: sā rākṣasī madhyagatā ca bhīrur; vāgbhir bhṛśaṃ rāvaṇatarjitā ca
GE09ram_05_u:026.002c: kāntāramadhye vijane visṛṣṭā; bāleva kanyā vilalāpa sītā
GE09ram_05_u:026.003a: satyaṃ batedaṃ pravadanti loke; nākālamṛtyur bhavatīti santaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:026.003c: yatrāham evaṃ paribhartsyamānā; jīvāmi kiṃ cit kṣaṇam apy apuṇyā
GE09ram_05_u:026.004a: sukhād vihīnaṃ bahuduḥkhapūrṇam; idaṃ tu nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthiraṃ me
GE09ram_05_u:026.004c: vidīryate yan na sahasradhādya; vajrāhataṃ śṛṅgam ivācalasya
GE09ram_05_u:026.005a: naivāsti nūnaṃ mama doṣam atra; vadhyāham asyāpriyadarśanasya
GE09ram_05_u:026.005c: bhāvaṃ na cāsyāham anupradātum; alaṃ dvijo mantram ivādvijāya
GE09ram_05_u:026.006a: nūnaṃ mamāṅgāny acirād anāryaḥ; śastraiḥ śitaiś chetsyati rākṣasendraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:026.006c: tasminn anāgacchati lokanāthe; garbhasthajantor iva śalyakṛntaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:026.007a: duḥkhaṃ batedaṃ mama duḥkhitāyā; māsau cirāyābhigamiṣyato dvau
GE09ram_05_u:026.007c: baddhasya vadhyasya yathā niśānte; rājāparādhād iva taskarasya
GE09ram_05_u:026.008a: hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre; hā rāma mātaḥ saha me jananyā
GE09ram_05_u:026.008c: eṣā vipadyāmy aham alpabhāgyā; mahārṇave naur iva mūḍha vātā
GE09ram_05_u:026.009a: tarasvinau dhārayatā mṛgasya; sattvena rūpaṃ manujendraputrau
GE09ram_05_u:026.009c: nūnaṃ viśastau mama kāraṇāt tau; siṃharṣabhau dvāv iva vaidyutena
GE09ram_05_u:026.010a: nūnaṃ sa kālo mṛgarūpadhārī; mām alpabhāgyāṃ lulubhe tadānīm
GE09ram_05_u:026.010c: yatrāryaputraṃ visasarja mūḍhā; rāmānujaṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvakaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:026.011a: hā rāma satyavrata dīrghavāho; hā pūrṇacandrapratimānavaktra
GE09ram_05_u:026.011c: hā jīvalokasya hitaḥ priyaś ca; vadhyāṃ na māṃ vetsi hi rākṣasānām
GE09ram_05_u:026.012a: ananyadevatvam iyaṃ kṣamā ca; bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaś ca dharme
GE09ram_05_u:026.012c: pativratātvaṃ viphalaṃ mamedaṃ; kṛtaṃ kṛtaghneṣv iva mānuṣāṇām
GE09ram_05_u:026.013a: mogho hi dharmaś carito mamāyaṃ; tathaikapatnītvam idaṃ nirartham
GE09ram_05_u:026.013c: yā tvāṃ na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā; hīnā tvayā saṃgamane nirāśā
GE09ram_05_u:026.014a: pitur nirdeśaṃ niyamena kṛtvā; vanān nivṛttaś caritavrataś ca
GE09ram_05_u:026.014c: strībhis tu manye vipulekṣaṇābhiḥ; saṃraṃsyase vītabhayaḥ kṛtārthaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:026.015a: ahaṃ tu rāma tvayi jātakāmā; ciraṃ vināśāya nibaddhabhāvā
GE09ram_05_u:026.015c: moghaṃ caritvātha tapovrataṃ ca; tyakṣyāmi dhig jīvitam alpabhāgyā
GE09ram_05_u:026.016a: sā jīvitaṃ kṣipram ahaṃ tyajeyaṃ; viṣeṇa śastreṇa śitena vāpi
GE09ram_05_u:026.016c: viṣasya dātā na tu me 'sti kaś cic; chastrasya vā veśmani rākṣasasya
GE09ram_05_u:026.017a: śokābhitaptā bahudhā vicintya; sītātha veṇyudgrathanaṃ gṛhītvā
GE09ram_05_u:026.017c: udbadhya veṇyudgrathanena śīghram; ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi yamasya mūlam
GE09ram_05_u:026.018a: itīva sītā bahudhā vilapya; sarvātmanā rāmam anusmarantī
GE09ram_05_u:026.019a: upasthitā sā mṛdur sarvagātrī; śākhāṃ gṛhītvātha nagasya tasya
GE09ram_05_u:026.019c: tasyās tu rāmaṃ pravicintayantyā; rāmānujaṃ svaṃ ca kulaṃ śubhāṅgyāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:026.020a: śokānimittāni tadā bahūni; dhairyārjitāni pravarāṇi loke
GE09ram_05_u:026.020c: prādurnimittāni tadā babhūvuḥ; purāpi siddhāny upalakṣitāni
GE09ram_05_u:027.001a: tathāgatāṃ tāṃ vyathitām aninditāṃ; vyapetaharṣāṃ paridīnamānasām
GE09ram_05_u:027.001c: śubhāṃ nimittāni śubhāni bhejire; naraṃ śriyā juṣṭam ivopajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:027.002a: tasyāḥ śubhaṃ vāmam arālapakṣma; rājīvṛtaṃ kṛṣṇaviśālaśuklam
GE09ram_05_u:027.002c: prāspandataikaṃ nayanaṃ sukeśyā; mīnāhataṃ padmam ivābhitāmram
GE09ram_05_u:027.004a: gajendrahastapratimaś ca pīnas; tayor dvayoḥ saṃhatayoḥ sujātaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:027.004c: praspandamānaḥ punar ūrur asyā; rāmaṃ purastāt sthitam ācacakṣe
GE09ram_05_u:027.005c: vāsaḥ sthitāyāḥ śikharāgradantyāḥ; kiṃ cit parisraṃsata cārugātryāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:027.006a: etair nimittair aparaiś ca subhrūḥ; saṃbodhitā prāg api sādhusiddhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:027.006c: vātātapaklāntam iva pranaṣṭaṃ; varṣeṇa bījaṃ pratisaṃjaharṣa
GE09ram_05_u:027.007c: vaktraṃ babhāse sitaśukladaṃṣṭraṃ; rāhor mukhāc candra iva pramuktaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:027.008c: aśobhatāryā vadanena śukle; śītānśunā rātrir ivoditena
GE09ram_05_u:028.001a: hanumān api vikrāntaḥ sarvaṃ śuśrāva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.001c: sītāyās trijaṭāyāś ca rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjanam
GE09ram_05_u:028.002a: avekṣamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ devatām iva nandane
GE09ram_05_u:028.002c: tato bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.003a: yāṃ kapīnāṃ sahasrāṇi subahūny ayutāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:028.003c: dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante seyam āsāditā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:028.004a: cāreṇa tu suyuktena śatroḥ śaktim avekṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:028.004c: gūḍhena caratā tāvad avekṣitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:028.005a: rākṣasānāṃ viśeṣaś ca purī ceyam avekṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:028.007c: adṛṣṭaduḥkhāṃ duḥkhasya na hy antam adhigacchatīm
GE09ram_05_u:028.008a: yadi hy aham imāṃ devīṃ śokopahatacetanām
GE09ram_05_u:028.009a: gate hi mayi tatreyaṃ rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:028.011c: kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam idaṃ kṛcchra gato hy aham
GE09ram_05_u:028.013a: rāmaś ca yadi pṛcchen māṃ kiṃ māṃ sītābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.013c: kim ahaṃ taṃ pratibrūyām asaṃbhāṣya sumadhyamām
GE09ram_05_u:028.014c: nirdahed api kākutsthaḥ kruddhas tīvreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_05_u:028.016a: antaraṃ tv aham āsādya rākṣasīnām iha sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.017a: ahaṃ hy atitanuś caiva vanaraś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.018a: yadi vācaṃ pradāsyāmi dvijātir iva saṃskṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:028.018c: rāvaṇaṃ manyamānā māṃ sītā bhītā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:028.019a: avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ mānuṣaṃ vākyam arthavat
GE09ram_05_u:028.020a: seyam ālokya me rūpaṃ jānakī bhāṣitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:028.020c: rakṣobhis trāsitā pūrvaṃ bhūyas trāsaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:028.022a: sītayā ca kṛte śabde sahasā rākṣasīgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.023c: vadhe ca grahaṇe caiva kuryur yatnaṃ yathābalam
GE09ram_05_u:028.024a: taṃ māṃ śākhāḥ praśākhāś ca skandhāṃś cottamaśākhinām
GE09ram_05_u:028.025a: mama rūpaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vanaṃ vicarato mahat
GE09ram_05_u:028.026a: tataḥ kuryuḥ samāhvānaṃ rākṣasyo rakṣasām api
GE09ram_05_u:028.028a: saṃkruddhas tais tu parito vidhaman rakṣasāṃ balam
GE09ram_05_u:028.028c: śaknuyaṃ na tu saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.029a: māṃ vā gṛhṇīyur āplutya bahavaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.029c: syād iyaṃ cāgṛhītārthā mama ca grahaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:028.030c: vipannaṃ syāt tataḥ kāryaṃ rāmasugrīvayor idam
GE09ram_05_u:028.032a: viśaste vā gṛhīte vā rakṣobhir mayi saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:028.033a: vimṛśaṃś ca na paśyāmi yo hate mayi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.034a: kāmaṃ hantuṃ samartho 'smi sahasrāṇy api rakṣasām
GE09ram_05_u:028.034c: na tu śakṣyāmi saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.035a: asatyāni ca yuddhāni saṃśayo me na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:028.035c: kaś ca niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāt prājñaḥ sasaṃśayam
GE09ram_05_u:028.036a: eṣa doṣo mahān hi syān mama sītābhibhāṣaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:028.037c: viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_05_u:028.039a: na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:028.039c: laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:028.040a: kathaṃ nu khalu vākyaṃ me śṛṇuyān nodvijeta ca
GE09ram_05_u:028.040c: iti saṃcintya hanumāṃś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_05_u:028.043c: śraddhāsyati yathā hīyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ samādadhe
GE09ram_05_u:028.044a: iti sa bahuvidhaṃ mahānubhāvo; jagatipateḥ pramadām avekṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:028.044c: madhuram avitathaṃ jagāda vākyaṃ; drumaviṭapāntaram āsthito hanūmān
GE09ram_05_u:029.001c: saṃśrave madhuraṃ vākyaṃ vaidehyā vyājahāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:029.007c: sabhāryaḥ saha ca bhrātrā vīraḥ pravrajito vanam
GE09ram_05_u:029.008e: tatas tv amarṣāpahṛtā jānakī rāvaṇena tu
GE09ram_05_u:029.010c: jānakī cāpi tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatā
GE09ram_05_u:029.012a: sā tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca tathāpy adhastān; nirīkṣamāṇā tam acintya buddhim
GE09ram_05_u:029.012c: dadarśa piṅgādhipater amātyaṃ; vātātmajaṃ sūryam ivodayastham
GE09ram_05_u:030.001c: sā dadarśa kapiṃ tatra praśritaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_05_u:030.002a: sā tu dṛṣṭvā hariśreṣṭhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:030.002c: maithilī cintayām āsa svapno 'yam iti bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:030.003a: sā taṃ samīkṣyaiva bhṛśaṃ visaṃjñā; gatāsukalpeva babhūva sītā
GE09ram_05_u:030.003c: cireṇa saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya caiva; vicintayām āsa viśālanetrā
GE09ram_05_u:030.004a: svapno mayāyaṃ vikṛto 'dya dṛṣṭaḥ; śākhāmṛgaḥ śāstragaṇair niṣiddhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:030.004c: svasty astu rāmāya salakṣmaṇāya; tathā pitur me janakasya rājñaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:030.005a: svapno 'pi nāyaṃ na hi me 'sti nidrā; śokena duḥkhena ca pīḍitāyāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:030.005c: sukhaṃ hi me nāsti yato 'smi hīnā; tenendupūrṇapratimānanena
GE09ram_05_u:030.006a: ahaṃ hi tasyādya mano bhavena; saṃpīḍitā tad gatasarvabhāvā
GE09ram_05_u:030.006c: vicintayantī satataṃ tam eva; tathaiva paśyāmi tathā śṛṇomi
GE09ram_05_u:030.007a: manorathaḥ syād iti cintayāmi; tathāpi buddhyā ca vitarkayāmi
GE09ram_05_u:030.007c: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya hi nāsti rūpaṃ; suvyaktarūpaś ca vadaty ayaṃ mām
GE09ram_05_u:030.008a: namo 'stu vācaspataye savajriṇe; svayambhuve caiva hutāśanāya
GE09ram_05_u:030.008c: anena coktaṃ yad idaṃ mamāgrato; vanaukasā tac ca tathāstu nānyathā
GE09ram_05_u:031.001c: śirasy añjalim ādhāya sītāṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_05_u:031.002c: drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam aninditā
GE09ram_05_u:031.003a: kimarthaṃ tava netrābhyāṃ vāri sravati śokajam
GE09ram_05_u:031.004c: yakṣāṇāṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca kā tvaṃ bhavasi śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:031.005a: kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā varānane
GE09ram_05_u:031.005c: vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_05_u:031.006a: kiṃ nu candramasā hīnā patitā vibudhālayāt
GE09ram_05_u:031.007a: kopād vā yadi vā mohād bhartāram asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:031.007c: vasiṣṭhaṃ kopayitvā tvaṃ nāsi kalyāṇy arundhatī
GE09ram_05_u:031.008a: ko nau putraḥ pitā bhrāta bhartā vā te sumadhyame
GE09ram_05_u:031.008c: asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ gataṃ tvam anuśocasi
GE09ram_05_u:031.009a: vyañjanāni hi te yāni lakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:031.010c: sītā tvam asi bhadraṃ te tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.012c: sītā ca nāma nāmnāhaṃ bhāryā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.015c: kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ devī vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:031.016a: na pibeyaṃ na khādeyaṃ pratyahaṃ mama bhojanam
GE09ram_05_u:031.016c: eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_05_u:031.017a: yat tad uktaṃ tvayā vākyaṃ prītyā nṛpatisattama
GE09ram_05_u:031.017c: tac cen na vitathaṃ kāryaṃ vanaṃ gacchatu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.018a: sa rājā satyavāg devyā varadānam anusmaran
GE09ram_05_u:031.018c: mumoha vacanaṃ śrutvā kaikeyyāḥ krūram apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:031.019a: tatas tu sthaviro rājā satyadharme vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.019c: jyeṣṭhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ putraṃ rudan rājyam ayācata
GE09ram_05_u:031.020a: sa pitur vacanaṃ śrīmān abhiṣekāt paraṃ priyam
GE09ram_05_u:031.021a: dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyān na brūyat kiṃ cid apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:031.022c: visṛjya manasā rājyaṃ jananyai māṃ samādiśat
GE09ram_05_u:031.023c: na hi me tena hīnāyā vāsaḥ svarge 'pi rocate
GE09ram_05_u:031.024a: prāg eva tu mahābhāgaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.025a: te vayaṃ bhartur ādeśaṃ bahu mānyadṛḍhavratāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.025c: praviṣṭāḥ sma purād dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ gambhīradarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:031.027a: dvau māsau tena me kālo jīvitānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:031.027c: ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu māsābhyāṃ tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:032.002a: ahaṃ rāmasya saṃdeśād devi dūtas tavāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.002c: vaidehi kuśalī rāmas tvāṃ ca kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:032.003a: yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.003c: sa tvāṃ dāśarathī rāmo devi kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:032.004a: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā bhartus te 'nucaraḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.005a: sā tayoḥ kuśalaṃ devī niśamya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.006a: kalyāṇī bata gatheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_05_u:032.006c: ehi jīvantam ānado naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_05_u:032.009a: yathā yathā samīpaṃ sa hanūmān upasarpati
GE09ram_05_u:032.009c: tathā tathā rāvaṇaṃ sā taṃ sītā pariśaṅkate
GE09ram_05_u:032.010a: aho dhig dhik kṛtam idaṃ kathitaṃ hi yad asya me
GE09ram_05_u:032.010c: rūpāntaram upāgamya sa evāyaṃ hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.011a: tām aśokasya śākhāṃ sā vimuktvā śokakarśitā
GE09ram_05_u:032.013a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vandamānaṃ tu sītā śaśinibhānanā
GE09ram_05_u:032.014a: māyāṃ praviṣṭo māyāvī yadi tvaṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:032.014c: utpādayasi me bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:032.015c: janasthāne mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ sa evāsi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.016c: saṃtāpayasi māṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:032.017a: yadi rāmasya dūtas tvam āgato bhadram astu te
