GE09ram_05_u:032.017c: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha priyā rāma kathā hi me
GE09ram_05_u:032.018a: guṇān rāmasya kathaya priyasya mama vānara
GE09ram_05_u:032.018c: cittaṃ harasi me saumya nadīkūlaṃ yathā rayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.019a: aho svapnasya sukhatā yāham evaṃ cirāhṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:032.020a: svapne 'pi yady ahaṃ vīraṃ rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:032.021a: nāhaṃ svapnam imaṃ manye svapne dṛṣṭvā hi vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:032.021c: na śakyo 'bhyudayaḥ prāptuṃ prāptaś cābhyudayo mama
GE09ram_05_u:032.022a: kiṃ nu syāc cittamoho 'yaṃ bhaved vātagatis tv iyam
GE09ram_05_u:032.022c: unmādajo vikāro vā syād iyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
GE09ram_05_u:032.023a: atha vā nāyam unmādo moho 'py unmādalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.023c: saṃbudhye cāham ātmānam imaṃ cāpi vanaukasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:032.024a: ity evaṃ bahudhā sītā saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_05_u:032.025a: etāṃ buddhiṃ tadā kṛtvā sītā sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_05_u:032.027a: āditya iva tejasvī lokakāntaḥ śaśī yathā
GE09ram_05_u:032.027c: rājā sarvasya lokasya devo vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:032.029a: rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva mūrtimān
GE09ram_05_u:032.030c: śūnye yenāpanītāsi tasya drakṣyasi yat phalam
GE09ram_05_u:032.031a: nacirād rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye yo vadhiṣyati vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:032.032c: tvadviyogena duḥkhārtaḥ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:032.034a: rāmasya ca sakhā devi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.034c: rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:032.035a: nityaṃ smarati rāmas tvāṃ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:032.035c: diṣṭyā jīvasi vaidehi rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:032.036a: nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_05_u:032.039a: nāham asmi tathā devi yathā mām avagacchasi
GE09ram_05_u:032.039c: viśaṅkā tyajyatām eṣā śraddhatsva vadato mama
GE09ram_05_u:033.001a: tāṃ tu rāma kathāṃ śrutvā vaidehī vānararṣabhāt
GE09ram_05_u:033.001c: uvāca vacanaṃ sāntvam idaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_05_u:033.002a: kva te rāmeṇa saṃsargaḥ kathaṃ jānāsi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:033.002c: vānarāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.003a: yāni rāmasya liṅgāni lakṣmaṇasya ca vānara
GE09ram_05_u:033.003c: tāni bhūyaḥ samācakṣva na māṃ śokaḥ samāviśet
GE09ram_05_u:033.004a: kīdṛśaṃ tasya saṃsthānaṃ rūpaṃ rāmasya kīdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:033.004c: katham ūrū kathaṃ bāhū lakṣmaṇasya ca śaṃsa me
GE09ram_05_u:033.005a: evam uktas tu vaidehyā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.006a: jānantī bata diṣṭyā māṃ vaidehi paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_05_u:033.007a: yāni rāmasya cihnāni lakṣmaṇasya ca yāni vai
GE09ram_05_u:033.007c: lakṣitāni viśālākṣi vadataḥ śṛṇu tāni me
GE09ram_05_u:033.010c: rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.011c: maryādānāṃ ca lokasya kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.014c: dhanurvede ca vede ca vedāṅgeṣu ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.015c: gūḍhajatruḥ sutāmrākṣo rāmo devi janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.017a: tristhiras tripralambaś ca trisamas triṣu connataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.021a: bhrātā ca tasya dvaimātraḥ saumitrir aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.022a: tvām eva mārgamāṇo tau vicarantau vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_05_u:033.024a: vayaṃ tu harirājaṃ taṃ sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃgaram
GE09ram_05_u:033.026a: sa tau dṛṣṭvā naravyāghrau dhanvinau vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.027a: tataḥ sa śikhare tasmin vānarendro vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.027c: tayoḥ samīpaṃ mām eva preṣayām āsa satvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.029c: pṛṣṭham āropya taṃ deśaṃ prāpitau puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_05_u:033.032a: taṃ tataḥ sāntvayām āsa sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.032c: strīhetor vālinā bhrātrā nirastam uru tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:033.034a: sa śrutvā vānarendras tu lakṣmaṇeneritaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.036c: saṃhṛṣṭā darśayām āsur gatiṃ tu na vidus tava
GE09ram_05_u:033.038a: tāny aṅke darśanīyāni kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.039a: paśyatas tasyā rudatas tāmyataś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.040a: śayitaṃ ca ciraṃ tena duḥkhārtena mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:033.040c: mayāpi vividhair vākyaiḥ kṛcchrād utthāpitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.041a: tāni dṛṣṭvā mahārhāṇi darśayitvā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.043a: tvatkṛte tam anidrā ca śokaś cintā ca rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:033.045c: caran na ratim āpnoti tvam apaśyan nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_05_u:033.046a: sa tvāṃ manujaśārdūlaḥ kṣipraṃ prāpsyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.047c: samayaṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ tava cānveṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:033.048a: tato nihatya tarasā rāmo vālinam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:033.049c: hanūmantaṃ ca māṃ viddhi tayor dūtam ihāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:033.050c: tvadarthaṃ preṣayām āsa diśo daśa mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:033.054c: bhayāc ca kapirājasya prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.055c: anāsādya padaṃ devyāḥ prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.056c: tava nāśaṃ ca vaidehi vālinaś ca tathā vadham
GE09ram_05_u:033.058c: śrutvā bhrātṛvadhaṃ kopād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:033.059a: yavīyān kena me bhrātā hataḥ kva ca vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.061a: jaṭāyos tu vadhaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ so 'ruṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.061c: tvām āha sa varārohe vasantīṃ rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_05_u:033.063c: vyavadhūya bhayaṃ tīvraṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.064a: laṅkā cāpi mayā rātrau praviṣṭā rākṣasākulā
GE09ram_05_u:033.064c: rāvaṇaś ca mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca śokanipīḍitā
GE09ram_05_u:033.065a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāvṛttam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:033.065c: abhibhāṣasva māṃ devi dūto dāśarather aham
GE09ram_05_u:033.067c: guror ārādhane yukto lakṣmaṇaś ca sulakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.068a: tasya vīryavato devi bhartus tava hite rataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.068c: aham ekas tu saṃprāptaḥ sugrīvavacanād iha
GE09ram_05_u:033.071a: diṣṭyā hi na mama vyarthaṃ devi sāgaralaṅghanam
GE09ram_05_u:033.071c: prāpsyāmy aham idaṃ diṣṭyā tvaddarśanakṛtaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.072a: rāghavaś ca mahāvīryaḥ kṣipraṃ tvām abhipatsyate
GE09ram_05_u:033.073a: kaurajo nāma vaidehi girīṇām uttamo giriḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.073c: tato gacchati gokarṇaṃ parvataṃ kesarī hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.074a: sa ca devarṣibhir dṛṣṭaḥ pitā mama mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.075a: tasyāhaṃ hariṇaḥ kṣetre jāto vātena maithili
GE09ram_05_u:033.075c: hanūmān iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:033.075e: viśvāsārthaṃ tu vaidehi bhartur uktā mayā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:033.077a: atulaṃ ca gatā harṣaṃ praharṣeṇa tu jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:033.078e: hanūmantaṃ kapiṃ vyaktaṃ manyate nānyatheti sā
GE09ram_05_u:033.080c: tato 'smi vāyuprabhavo hi maithili; prabhāvatas tatpratimaś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.002e: samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te kṣīṇaduḥkhaphalā hy asi
GE09ram_05_u:034.005a: tataḥ sā hrīmatī bālā bhartuḥ saṃdeśaharṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:034.006a: vikrāntas tvaṃ samarthas tvaṃ prājñas tvaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:034.008a: na hi tvāṃ prākṛtaṃ manye vanaraṃ vanararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:034.008c: yasya te nāsti saṃtrāso rāvaṇān nāpi saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.009c: yady asi preṣitas tena rāmeṇa viditātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:034.010a: preṣayiṣyati durdharṣo rāmo na hy aparīkṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:034.011a: diṣṭyā ca kuśalī rāmo dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.012a: kuśalī yadi kākutsthaḥ kiṃ nu sāgaramekhalām
GE09ram_05_u:034.013a: atha vā śaktimantau tau surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_05_u:034.013c: mamaiva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.014a: kaccic ca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccin na paripatyate
GE09ram_05_u:034.015a: kaccin na dīnaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kāryeṣu ca na muhyati
GE09ram_05_u:034.016c: vijigīṣuḥ suhṛt kaccin mitreṣu ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.017a: kaccin mitrāṇi labhate mitraiś cāpy abhigamyate
GE09ram_05_u:034.017c: kaccit kalyāṇamitraś ca mitraiś cāpi puraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.018c: kaccit puruṣakāraṃ ca daivaṃ ca pratipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:034.019a: kaccin na vigatasneho vivāsān mayi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.019c: kaccin māṃ vyasanād asmān mokṣayiṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.020c: duḥkham uttaram āsādya kaccid rāmo na sīdati
GE09ram_05_u:034.021a: kausalyāyās tathā kaccit sumitrāyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:034.021c: abhīkṣṇaṃ śrūyate kaccit kuśalaṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:034.022c: kaccin nānyamanā rāmaḥ kaccin māṃ tārayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:034.026a: raudreṇa kaccid astreṇa rāmeṇa nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:034.027a: kaccin na tad dhemasamānavarṇaṃ; tasyānanaṃ padmasamānagandhi
GE09ram_05_u:034.027c: mayā vinā śuṣyati śokadīnaṃ; jalakṣaye padmam ivātapena
GE09ram_05_u:034.028a: dharmāpadeśāt tyajataś ca rājyāṃ; māṃ cāpy araṇyaṃ nayataḥ padātim
GE09ram_05_u:034.028c: nāsīd vyathā yasya na bhīr na śokaḥ; kaccit sa dhairyaṃ hṛdaye karoti
GE09ram_05_u:034.029a: na cāsya mātā na pitā na cānyaḥ; snehād viśiṣṭo 'sti mayā samo vā
GE09ram_05_u:034.029c: tāvad dhy ahaṃ dūtajijīviṣeyaṃ; yāvat pravṛttiṃ śṛṇuyāṃ priyasya
GE09ram_05_u:034.030a: itīva devī vacanaṃ mahārthaṃ; taṃ vānarendraṃ madhurārtham uktvā
GE09ram_05_u:034.030c: śrotuṃ punas tasya vaco 'bhirāmaṃ; rāmārthayuktaṃ virarāma rāmā
GE09ram_05_u:034.031c: śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:034.032a: na tvām ihasthāṃ jānīte rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.032c: śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.034a: tatra yady antarā mṛtyur yadi devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.034c: sthāsyanti pathi rāmasya sa tān api vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:034.035c: na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.036a: dardareṇa ca te devi śape mūlaphalena ca
GE09ram_05_u:034.036c: malayena ca vindhyena meruṇā mandareṇa ca
GE09ram_05_u:034.038a: kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi vaidehi rāmaṃ prasravaṇe girau
GE09ram_05_u:034.039a: na māṃsaṃ rāghavo bhuṅkte na cāpi madhusevate
GE09ram_05_u:034.039c: vanyaṃ suvihitaṃ nityaṃ bhaktam aśnāti pañcamam
GE09ram_05_u:034.040a: naiva daṃśān na maśakān na kīṭān na sarīsṛpān
GE09ram_05_u:034.041c: nānyac cintayate kiṃ cit sa tu kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.042a: anidraḥ satataṃ rāmaḥ supto 'pi ca narottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.043a: dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yac cānyat strīmanoharam
GE09ram_05_u:034.043c: bahuśo hā priyety evaṃ śvasaṃs tvām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_05_u:034.044a: sa devi nityaṃ paritapyamānas; tvām eva sītety abhibhāṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:034.044c: dhṛtavrato rājasuto mahātmā; tavaiva lābhāya kṛtaprayatnaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.002c: yac ca nānyamanā rāmo yac ca śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.003a: aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe
GE09ram_05_u:035.004c: saumitriṃ māṃ ca rāmaṃ ca vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitān
GE09ram_05_u:035.006a: rākṣasānāṃ kṣayaṃ kṛtvā sūdayitvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:035.006c: laṅkām unmūlitāṃ kṛtvā kadā drakṣyati māṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.007a: sa vācyaḥ saṃtvarasveti yāvad eva na pūryate
GE09ram_05_u:035.007c: ayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ kālas tāvad dhi mama jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:035.008a: vartate daśamo māso dvau tu śeṣau plavaṃgama
GE09ram_05_u:035.008c: rāvaṇena nṛśaṃsena samayo yaḥ kṛto mama
GE09ram_05_u:035.009a: vibhīṣaṇena ca bhrātrā mama niryātanaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:035.009c: anunītaḥ prayatnena na ca tat kurute matim
GE09ram_05_u:035.010a: mama pratipradānaṃ hi rāvaṇasya na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:035.010c: rāvaṇaṃ mārgate saṃkhye mṛtyuḥ kālavaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_05_u:035.011c: tayā mamaitad ākhyātaṃ mātrā prahitayā svayam
GE09ram_05_u:035.013c: na ca tasyāpi duṣṭātmā śṛṇoti vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_05_u:035.014a: āśaṃseti hariśreṣṭha kṣipraṃ māṃ prāpsyate patiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.014c: antarātmā hi me śuddhas tasmiṃś ca bahavo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.015c: vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca santi vānararāghave
GE09ram_05_u:035.016c: janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kas tasya nodvijet
GE09ram_05_u:035.017a: na sa śakyas tulayituṃ vyasanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.020a: śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.021a: atha vā mocayiṣyāmi tām adyaiva hi rākṣasāt
GE09ram_05_u:035.021c: asmād duḥkhād upāroha mama pṛṣṭham anindite
GE09ram_05_u:035.022a: tvaṃ hi pṛṣṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā saṃtariṣyāmi sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:035.022c: śaktir asti hi me voḍhuṃ laṅkām api sarāvaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:035.026a: pṛṣṭham āroha me devi mā vikāṅkṣasva śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:035.028a: na hi me saṃprayātasya tvām ito nayato 'ṅgane
GE09ram_05_u:035.029c: yāsyāmi paśya vaidehi tvām udyamya vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:035.030a: maithilī tu hariśreṣṭhāc chrutvā vacanam adbhutam
GE09ram_05_u:035.031a: hanūman dūram adhvanaṃ kathaṃ māṃ voḍhum icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:035.031c: tad eva khalu te manye kapitvaṃ hariyūthapa
GE09ram_05_u:035.032a: kathaṃ vālpaśarīras tvaṃ mām ito netum icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:035.033c: cintayām āsa lakṣmīvān navaṃ paribhavaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:035.034a: na me jānāti sattvaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vāsitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:035.034c: tasmāt paśyatu vaidehī yad rūpaṃ mama kāmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.036a: sa tasmāt pādapād dhīmān āplutya plavagarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.039c: laṅkām imāṃ sanathāṃ vā nayituṃ śaktir asti me
GE09ram_05_u:035.040a: tad avasthāpya tāṃ buddhir alaṃ devi vikāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_05_u:035.042a: tava sattvaṃ balaṃ caiva vijānāmi mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:035.042c: vāyor iva gatiṃ cāpi tejaś cāgnir ivādbhutam
GE09ram_05_u:035.043a: prākṛto 'nyaḥ kathaṃ cemāṃ bhūmim āgantum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:035.044a: jānāmi gamane śaktiṃ nayane cāpi te mama
GE09ram_05_u:035.045a: ayuktaṃ tu kapiśreṣṭha mayā gantuṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_05_u:035.046a: aham ākāśam āsaktā upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:035.046c: prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhād bhayād vegena gacchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.047c: bhayeyam āśu vivaśā yādasām annam uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:035.048a: na ca śakṣye tvayā sārdhaṃ gantuṃ śatruvināśana
GE09ram_05_u:035.048c: kalatravati saṃdehas tvayy api syād asaṃśayam
GE09ram_05_u:035.049a: hriyamāṇāṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.050a: tais tvaṃ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūlam udgara pāṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.050c: bhaves tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ prāpto mayā vīra kalatravān
GE09ram_05_u:035.051a: sāyudhā bahavo vyomni rākṣasās tvaṃ nirāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.051c: kathaṃ śakṣyasi saṃyātuṃ māṃ caiva parirakṣitum
GE09ram_05_u:035.052c: prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhad bhayārtā kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:035.053a: atha rakṣāṃsi bhīmāni mahānti balavanti ca
GE09ram_05_u:035.053c: kathaṃ cit sāmparāye tvāṃ jayeyuḥ kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:035.054a: atha vā yudhyamānasya pateyaṃ vimukhasya te
GE09ram_05_u:035.054c: patitāṃ ca gṛhītvā māṃ nayeyuḥ pāparākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.055a: māṃ vā hareyus tvaddhastād viśaseyur athāpi vā
GE09ram_05_u:035.056c: tvatprayatno hariśreṣṭha bhaven niṣphala eva tu
GE09ram_05_u:035.057a: kāmaṃ tvam api paryāpto nihantuṃ sarvarākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:035.057c: rāghavasya yaśo hīyet tvayā śastais tu rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.058a: atha vādāya rakṣāṃsi nyasyeyuḥ saṃvṛte hi mām
GE09ram_05_u:035.058c: yatra te nābhijānīyur harayo nāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.059a: ārambhas tu madartho 'yaṃ tatas tava nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.059c: tvayā hi saha rāmasya mahān āgamane guṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.060c: bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahābāho tava rājakulasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:035.062a: bhartur bhaktiṃ puraskṛtya rāmād anyasya vānara
GE09ram_05_u:035.062c: nāhaṃ spraṣṭuṃ padā gātram iccheyaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:035.063a: yad ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ rāvaṇasya gatā balāt
GE09ram_05_u:035.063c: anīśā kiṃ kariṣyāmi vināthā vivaśā satī
GE09ram_05_u:035.064a: yadi rāmo daśagrīvam iha hatvā sarākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:035.064c: mām ito gṛhya gaccheta tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:035.065a: śrutā hi dṛṣṭāś ca mayā parākramā; mahātmanas tasya raṇāvamardinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:035.065c: na devagandharvabhujaṃgarākṣasā; bhavanti rāmeṇa samā hi saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:035.066a: samīkṣya taṃ saṃyati citrakārmukaṃ; mahābalaṃ vāsavatulyavikramam
GE09ram_05_u:035.066c: salakṣmaṇaṃ ko viṣaheta rāghavaṃ; hutāśanaṃ dīptam ivānileritam
GE09ram_05_u:035.067a: salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam ājimardanaṃ; diśāgajaṃ mattam iva vyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:035.067c: saheta ko vānaramukhya saṃyuge; yugāntasūryapratimaṃ śarārciṣam
GE09ram_05_u:035.068a: sa me hariśreṣṭha salakṣmaṇaṃ patiṃ; sayūthapaṃ kṣipram ihopapādaya
GE09ram_05_u:035.068c: cirāya rāmaṃ prati śokakarśitāṃ; kuruṣva māṃ vānaramukhya harṣitām
GE09ram_05_u:036.001a: tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlas tena vākyena harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.001c: sītām uvāca tac chrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.003a: strītvaṃ na tu samarthaṃ hi sāgaraṃ vyativartitum
GE09ram_05_u:036.004a: dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yac ca bravīṣi vinayānvite
GE09ram_05_u:036.004c: rāmād anyasya nārhāmi saṃsparśam iti jānaki
GE09ram_05_u:036.005a: etat te devi sadṛśaṃ patnyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.005c: kā hy anyā tvām ṛte devi brūyād vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:036.006c: ceṣṭitaṃ yat tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ mama cāgrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.009c: gurusnehena bhaktyā ca nānyathā tad udāhṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:036.010a: yadi notsahase yātuṃ mayā sārdham anindite
GE09ram_05_u:036.010c: abhijñānaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ jānīyād rāghavo hi yat
GE09ram_05_u:036.012a: idaṃ śreṣṭham abhijñānaṃ brūyās tvaṃ tu mama priyam
GE09ram_05_u:036.016c: tam ahaṃ loṣṭam udyamya vārayāmi sma vāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:036.017a: dārayan sa ca māṃ kākas tatraiva parilīyate
GE09ram_05_u:036.017c: na cāpy uparaman māṃsād bhakṣārthī balibhojanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.018a: utkarṣantyāṃ ca raśanāṃ kruddhāyāṃ mayi pakṣiṇe
GE09ram_05_u:036.018c: sraṃsamāne ca vasane tato dṛṣṭā tvayā hy aham
GE09ram_05_u:036.019a: tvayā vihasitā cāhaṃ kruddhā saṃlajjitā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:036.019c: bhakṣya gṛddhena kālena dāritā tvām upāgatā
GE09ram_05_u:036.020a: āsīnasya ca te śrāntā punar utsaṅgam āviśam
GE09ram_05_u:036.022a: āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ śvasān vākyam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.022c: kena te nāganāsoru vikṣataṃ vai stanāntaram
GE09ram_05_u:036.023a: vīkṣamāṇas tatas taṃ vai vāyasaṃ samavaikṣathāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.023c: nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:036.024a: putraḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.025c: vāyase kṛtavān krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:036.026c: sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukho dvijam
GE09ram_05_u:036.027a: cikṣepitha pradīptāṃ tām iṣīkāṃ vāyasaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:036.027c: anusṛṣṭas tadā kālo jagāma vividhāṃ gatim
GE09ram_05_u:036.027e: trāṇakāma imaṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:036.028a: sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.028c: trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.029a: taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:036.029e: na śarma labdhvā lokeṣu tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.030a: paridyūnaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ ca sa tvam āyāntam uktavān
GE09ram_05_u:036.030c: moghaṃ kartuṃ na śakyaṃ tu brāhmam astraṃ tad ucyatām
GE09ram_05_u:036.031a: tatas tasyākṣi kākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:036.032a: sa te tadā namaskṛtvā rājñe daśarathāya ca
GE09ram_05_u:036.032c: tvayā vīra visṛṣṭas tu pratipede svam ālayam
GE09ram_05_u:036.033c: kasmād yo māṃ harat tvattaḥ kṣamase taṃ mahīpate
GE09ram_05_u:036.034a: sa kuruṣva mahotsāhaṃ kṛpāṃ mayi nararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:036.034c: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmas tvatta eva mayā śrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.036a: evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān balavān api
GE09ram_05_u:036.036c: kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:036.037a: na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.037c: rāmasya samare vegaṃ śaktāḥ prati samādhitum
GE09ram_05_u:036.038a: tasyā vīryavataḥ kaś cid yady asti mayi saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.038c: kimarthaṃ na śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣayaṃ nayati rākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:036.039a: bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.039c: kasya hetor na māṃ vīraḥ paritrāti mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.040c: surāṇām api durdharṣo kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.041a: mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.041c: samarthāv api tau yan māṃ nāvekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_05_u:036.042c: taṃ mamārthe sukhaṃ pṛccha śirasā cābhivādaya
GE09ram_05_u:036.043a: srajaś ca sarvaratnāni priyā yāś ca varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.043c: aiśvaryaṃ ca viśālāyāṃ pṛthivyām api durlabham
GE09ram_05_u:036.046a: pitṛvad vartate rāme mātṛvan māṃ samācaran
GE09ram_05_u:036.046c: hriyamāṇāṃ tadā vīro na tu māṃ veda lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.048a: mattaḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhrātā rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.048c: niyukto dhuri yasyāṃ tu tām udvahati vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:036.049a: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavo naiva vṛddham āryam anusmarat
GE09ram_05_u:036.049c: sa mamārthāya kuśalaṃ vaktavyo vacanān mama
GE09ram_05_u:036.049e: mṛdur nityaṃ śucir dakṣaḥ priyo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.050a: idaṃ brūyāś ca me nāthaṃ śūraṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.050e: ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ satyenāhaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_05_u:036.051c: trātum arhasi vīra tvaṃ pātālād iva kauśikīm
GE09ram_05_u:036.052a: tato vastragataṃ muktvā divyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_05_u:036.053c: aṅgulyā yojayām āsa na hy asyā prābhavad bhujaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.054c: sītāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇataḥ pārśvataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.055c: hṛdayena gato rāmaṃ śarīreṇa tu viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:036.056a: maṇivaram upagṛhya taṃ mahārhaṃ; janakanṛpātmajayā dhṛtaṃ prabhāvāt
GE09ram_05_u:037.001a: maṇiṃ dattvā tataḥ sītā hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_05_u:037.002a: maṇiṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rāmo vai trayāṇāṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:037.002c: vīro jananyā mama ca rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:037.003a: sa bhūyas tvaṃ samutsāhe codito harisattama
GE09ram_05_u:037.004c: tasya cintaya yo yatno duḥkhakṣayakaro bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:037.007c: sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ vṛddhān sarvāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_05_u:037.008a: yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.009a: jīvantīṃ māṃ yathā rāmaḥ saṃbhāvayati kīrtimān
GE09ram_05_u:037.009c: tat tvayā hanuman vācyaṃ vācā dharmam avāpnuhi
GE09ram_05_u:037.010a: nityam utsāhayuktāś ca vācaḥ śrutvā mayeritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.012a: sītāyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.012c: śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:037.013c: yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:037.014a: na hi paśyāmi martyeṣu nāmareṣv asureṣu vā
GE09ram_05_u:037.014c: yas tasya vamato bāṇān sthātum utsahate 'grataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.015a: apy arkam api parjanyam api vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE09ram_05_u:037.015c: sa hi soḍhuṃ raṇe śaktas tavahetor viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.016a: sa hi sāgaraparyantāṃ mahīṃ śāsitum īhate
GE09ram_05_u:037.016c: tvan nimitto hi rāmasya jayo janakanandini
GE09ram_05_u:037.017a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā samyak satyaṃ subhāṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:037.017c: jānakī bahu mene 'tha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:037.018a: tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.019a: yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:037.019c: kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:037.020a: mama ced alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:037.020c: asya śokasya mahato muhūrtaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:037.021c: prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.023a: ayaṃ ca vīra saṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.024a: kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:037.025c: śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:037.026c: kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ tvaṃ hi kāryavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.027a: kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:037.028a: balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ rāvaṇaṃ jitya saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:037.028c: vijayī svapuraṃ yāyāt tat tu me syād yaśaskaram
GE09ram_05_u:037.029a: balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.029c: māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:037.030a: tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.030c: bhaved āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
GE09ram_05_u:037.031c: niśamya hanumāñ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:037.035a: yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.035c: na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.037a: madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.037c: mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:037.038a: ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.038c: na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.039a: tad alaṃ paritāpena devi śoko vyapaitu te
GE09ram_05_u:037.040a: mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_05_u:037.041a: tau hi vīrau naravarau sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_05_u:037.043a: tad āśvasihi bhadraṃ te bhava tvaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:037.045a: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ devi śokasya pāraṃ yāsyasi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:037.046c: gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:037.047a: tam arighnaṃ kṛtātmānaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:037.050a: sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍito manmatheṣuṇā
GE09ram_05_u:037.050c: na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.051a: mā rudo devi śokena mā bhūt te manaso 'priyam
GE09ram_05_u:037.051c: śacīva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hy asi
GE09ram_05_u:037.052a: rāmād viśiṣṭaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti kaś cit saumitriṇā samaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:037.053a: nāsmiṃś ciraṃ vatsyasi devi deśe; rakṣogaṇair adhyuṣito 'tiraudre
GE09ram_05_u:037.053c: na te cirād āgamanaṃ priyasya; kṣamasva matsaṃgamakālamātram
GE09ram_05_u:038.001a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya vāyusūnor mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.003c: saṃspṛśeyaṃ sakāmāhaṃ tathā kuru dayāṃ mayi
GE09ram_05_u:038.005c: tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake taṃ kila smartum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:038.006a: sa vīryavān kathaṃ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ samanumanyase
GE09ram_05_u:038.007c: etaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_05_u:038.008a: eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.008c: ataḥ paraṃ na śakṣyāmi jīvituṃ śokalālasā
GE09ram_05_u:038.009a: asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaś ca hṛdayacchidaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.010c: māsād ūrdhvaṃ na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_05_u:038.011a: ghoro rākṣasarājo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca na sukhā mayi
GE09ram_05_u:038.011c: tvāṃ ca śrutvā vipadyantaṃ na jīveyam ahaṃ kṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:038.013a: tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_05_u:038.014a: dṛṣṭā kathaṃ cid bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_05_u:038.014c: imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:038.016a: hatvā tu samare krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_05_u:038.016c: rāghavau tvāṃ viśālākṣi svāṃ purīṃ prāpayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.017a: yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:038.017c: prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya bhūyas tvaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:038.018e: śraddheyaṃ hanuman vākyaṃ tava vīra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:038.019a: sa taṃ maṇivaraṃ gṛhya śrīmān plavagasattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.021c: sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_05_u:038.022a: yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.023a: imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:038.023c: brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu haripravīra
GE09ram_05_u:038.024a: sa rājaputryā prativeditārthaḥ; kapiḥ kṛtārthaḥ parihṛṣṭacetāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:038.024c: tad alpaśeṣaṃ prasamīkṣya kāryaṃ; diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ manasā jagāma
GE09ram_05_u:039.001a: sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhir gamiṣyan pūjitas tayā
GE09ram_05_u:039.001c: tasmād deśād apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.002c: trīn upāyān atikramya caturtha iha dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:039.003a: na sāma rakṣaḥsu guṇāya kalpate; na danam arthopaciteṣu vartate
GE09ram_05_u:039.003c: na bhedasādhyā baladarpitā janāḥ; parākramas tv eṣa mameha rocate
GE09ram_05_u:039.004a: na cāsya kāryasya parākramād ṛte; viniścayaḥ kaś cid ihopapadyate
GE09ram_05_u:039.004c: hṛtapravīrās tu raṇe hi rākṣasāḥ; kathaṃ cid īyur yad ihādya mārdavam
GE09ram_05_u:039.005a: kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūny api sādhayet
GE09ram_05_u:039.006a: na hy ekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.006c: yo hy arthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho 'rthasādhane
GE09ram_05_u:039.007a: ihaiva tāvat kṛtaniścayo hy ahaṃ; yadi vrajeyaṃ plavageśvarālayam
GE09ram_05_u:039.007c: parātmasaṃmarda viśeṣatattvavit; tataḥ kṛtaṃ syān mama bhartṛśāsanam
GE09ram_05_u:039.008a: kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ; prasahya yuddhaṃ mama rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:039.008c: tathaiva khalv ātmabalaṃ ca sāravat; samānayen māṃ ca raṇe daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.010c: asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.011a: tato mahat sāśvamahārathadvipaṃ; balaṃ samāneṣv api rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.011c: triśūlakālāyasapaṭṭiśāyudhaṃ; tato mahad yuddham idaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:039.012a: ahaṃ tu taiḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaiḥ; sametya rakṣobhir asaṃgavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.012c: nihatya tad rāvaṇacoditaṃ balaṃ; sukhaṃ gamiṣyāmi kapīśvarālayam
GE09ram_05_u:039.014a: tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam
GE09ram_05_u:039.015a: tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.016a: latāgṛhaiś citragṛhaiś ca nāśitair; mahoragair vyālamṛgaiś ca nirdhutaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.016c: śilāgṛhair unmathitais tathā gṛhaiḥ; pranaṣṭarūpaṃ tad abhūn mahad vanam
GE09ram_05_u:039.017a: sa tasya kṛtvārthapater mahākapir; mahad vyalīkaṃ manaso mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:039.017c: yuyutsur eko bahubhir mahābalaiḥ; śriyā jvalaṃs toraṇam āśritaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.003c: tad vanaṃ dadṛśur bhagnaṃ taṃ ca vīraṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_05_u:040.004a: sa tā dṛṣṭva mahābāhur mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.006a: ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāyaṃ kiṃnimittam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.006c: kathaṃ tvayā sahānena saṃvādaḥ kṛta ity uta
GE09ram_05_u:040.007a: ācakṣva no viśālākṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam
GE09ram_05_u:040.007c: saṃvādam asitāpāṅge tvayā kiṃ kṛtavān ayam
GE09ram_05_u:040.008c: rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.009a: yūyam evāsya jānīta yo 'yaṃ yad vā kariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:040.009c: ahir eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.010a: aham apy asya bhītāsmi nainaṃ jānāmi ko 'nvayam
GE09ram_05_u:040.011a: vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyo vidrutā drutam
GE09ram_05_u:040.011c: sthitāḥ kāś cid gatāḥ kāś cid rāvaṇāya niveditum
GE09ram_05_u:040.014a: na ca taṃ jānakī sītā hariṃ hariṇalocaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:040.015a: vāsavasya bhaved dūto dūto vaiśravaṇasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:040.016a: tena tvadbhūtarūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam
GE09ram_05_u:040.017a: na tatra kaś cid uddeśo yas tena na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.017c: yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.018c: atha vā kaḥ śramas tasya saiva tenābhirakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:040.020c: sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tad vanaṃ ca vināśitam
GE09ram_05_u:040.021c: kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yo na syāt tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.023a: ātmanaḥ sadṛśāñ śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:040.026a: te kapiṃ taṃ samāsādya toraṇastham avasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:040.028c: kṣitāv āvidhya lāṅgūlaṃ nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:040.030c: citraiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.031a: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.032a: sa taṃ parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān
GE09ram_05_u:040.034a: sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.035a: tatas tasmād bhayān muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:040.036a: sa rākṣasānāṃ nihataṃ mahābalaṃ; niśamya rājā parivṛttalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.001a: tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.001c: vanaṃ bhagnaṃ mayā caityaprāsādo na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.001e: tasmāt prāsādam apy evam imaṃ vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:041.002a: iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam
GE09ram_05_u:041.004a: sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.004c: dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_05_u:041.005c: petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiś cedam aghoṣayat
GE09ram_05_u:041.006a: jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.008a: na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:041.008c: śilābhis tu praharataḥ pādapaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.009a: ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:041.011a: tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.011c: gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_05_u:041.012a: āvarta iva gaṅgāyās toyasya vipulo mahān
GE09ram_05_u:041.012c: parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.014e: tatas taṃ bhrāmayām āsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:041.017a: śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_05_u:041.018a: neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.004c: pradiśaś ca nabhaś caiva sahasā samapūryata
GE09ram_05_u:042.005a: rathena kharayuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.005c: hanūmān vegasaṃpanno jaharṣa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_05_u:042.007c: bāhvor vivyādha nārācair daśabhis taṃ kapīśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:042.008a: tasya tac chuśubhe tāmraṃ śareṇābhihataṃ mukham
GE09ram_05_u:042.010a: tarasā tāṃ samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavad balī
GE09ram_05_u:042.010c: tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ kruddhas tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.011a: vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃś caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.011c: sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:042.013a: sālaṃ caturbhir ciccheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje
GE09ram_05_u:042.013c: urasy ekena bāṇena daśabhis tu stanāntare
GE09ram_05_u:042.014a: sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.014c: tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.016a: tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī
GE09ram_05_u:042.016c: na dhanur na ratho nāśvās tatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.017a: sa hatas tarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:042.018a: jambumāliṃ ca nihataṃ kiṃkarāṃś ca mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:043.001a: tatas te rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:043.005a: jananyas tās tatas teṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān
GE09ram_05_u:043.009a: sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:043.010a: sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate
GE09ram_05_u:043.010c: dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare
GE09ram_05_u:043.011a: sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm
GE09ram_05_u:043.011c: cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:043.012a: talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:043.012c: muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat
GE09ram_05_u:043.013a: pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:043.013c: ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_05_u:043.014a: tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca
GE09ram_05_u:043.014c: tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam
GE09ram_05_u:043.015a: vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:043.016a: sa tān pravṛddhān vinihatya rākṣasān; mahābalaś caṇḍaparākramaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:043.016c: yuyutsur anyaiḥ punar eva rākṣasais; tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:044.005a: yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam
GE09ram_05_u:044.006a: na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan
GE09ram_05_u:044.006e: bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt
GE09ram_05_u:044.007c: yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.008a: tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.008c: tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām
GE09ram_05_u:044.009c: dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.010a: vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.010c: nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.011a: naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.011c: na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam
GE09ram_05_u:044.012a: mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:044.012c: prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.013c: bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire
GE09ram_05_u:044.014a: tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:044.014c: ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā
GE09ram_05_u:044.016a: rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.016c: śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.017a: tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_05_u:044.019a: taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.019c: tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.020a: tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.021a: sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.021c: utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan
GE09ram_05_u:044.022a: tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.023a: sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:044.024c: cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān
GE09ram_05_u:044.025a: sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.030a: sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.030c: tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.031a: tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā
GE09ram_05_u:044.032a: bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:044.036c: balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.037a: aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān
GE09ram_05_u:044.037c: sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
GE09ram_05_u:044.038a: hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.038c: hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:044.039a: tataḥ kapis tān dhvajinīpatīn raṇe; nihatya vīrān sabalān savāhanān
GE09ram_05_u:044.039c: tad eva vīraḥ parigṛhya toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:045.001a: senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān; hanūmatā sānucarān savāhanān
GE09ram_05_u:045.001c: samīkṣya rājā samaroddhatonmukhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ prasamaikṣatākṣatam
GE09ram_05_u:045.002c: samutpapātātha sadasy udīrito; dvijātimukhyair haviṣeva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.003c: rathāṃ samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān; mahāhariṃ taṃ prati nairṛtarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.006c: divākarābhaṃ ratham āsthitas tataḥ; sa nirjagāmāmaratulyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.007a: sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ; turaṃgamataṅgamahārathasvanaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.007c: balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇasthitaṃ; samartham āsīnam upāgamat kapim
GE09ram_05_u:045.008a: sa taṃ samāsādya hariṃ harīkṣaṇo; yugāntakālāgnim iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:045.009a: sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ; parākramaṃ cāriṣu pārhtivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.009c: vicārayan khaṃ ca balaṃ mahābalo; himakṣaye sūrya ivābhivardhate
GE09ram_05_u:045.010a: sa jātamanyuḥ prasamīkṣya vikramaṃ; sthiraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyati durnivāraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:045.010c: samāhitātmā hanumantam āhave; pracodayām āsa śarais tribhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.011a: tataḥ kapiṃ taṃ prasamīkṣya garvitaṃ; jitaśramaṃ śatruparājayor jitam
GE09ram_05_u:045.012c: tayor babhūvāpratimaḥ samāgamaḥ; surāsurāṇām api saṃbhramapradaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.013a: rarāsa bhūmir na tatāpa bhānumān; vavau na vāyuḥ pracacāla cācalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.013c: kapeḥ kumārasya ca vīkṣya saṃyugaṃ; nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe
GE09ram_05_u:045.014a: tataḥ sa vīraḥ sumukhān patatriṇaḥ; suvarṇapuṅkhān saviṣān ivoragān
GE09ram_05_u:045.014c: samādhisaṃyogavimokṣatattvavic; charān atha trīn kapimūrdhny apātayat
GE09ram_05_u:045.015a: sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ; kṣarann asṛgdigdhavivṛttalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.016a: tataḥ sa piṅgādhipamantrisattamaḥ; samīkṣya taṃ rājavarātmajaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:045.017c: kumāram akṣaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ; dadāha netrāgnimarīcibhis tadā
GE09ram_05_u:045.018a: tataḥ sa bāṇāsanaśakrakārmukaḥ; śarapravarṣo yudhi rākṣasāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.018c: śarān mumocāśu harīśvarācale; balāhako vṛṣṭim ivācalottame
GE09ram_05_u:045.019c: kumāram akṣaṃ prasamīkṣya saṃyuge; nanāda harṣād ghanatulyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.020a: sa bālabhāvād yudhi vīryadarpitaḥ; pravṛddhamanyuḥ kṣatajopamekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.020c: samāsasādāpratimaṃ raṇe kapiṃ; gajo mahākūpam ivāvṛtaṃ tṛṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.021a: sa tena bāṇaiḥ prasabhaṃ nipātitaiś; cakāra nādaṃ ghananādaniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.021c: samutpapātāśu nabhaḥ sa mārutir; bhujoruvikṣepaṇa ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.022a: samutpatantaṃ samabhidravad balī; sa rākṣasānāṃ pravaraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_05_u:045.022c: rathī rathaśreṣṭhatamaḥ kirañ śaraiḥ; payodharaḥ śailam ivāśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.023a: sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś; cacāra vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite
GE09ram_05_u:045.023c: śarāntare mārutavad viniṣpatan; manojavaḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.024a: tam āttabāṇāsanam āhavonmukhaṃ; kham āstṛṇantaṃ vividhaiḥ śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.024c: avaikṣatākṣaṃ bahumānacakṣuṣā; jagāma cintāṃ ca sa mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.025a: tataḥ śarair bhinnabhujāntaraḥ kapiḥ; kumāravaryeṇa mahātmanā nadan
GE09ram_05_u:045.025c: mahābhujaḥ karmaviśeṣatattvavid; vicintayām āsa raṇe parākramam
GE09ram_05_u:045.026a: abālavad bāladivākaraprabhaḥ; karoty ayaṃ karma mahan mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.026c: na cāsya sarvāhavakarmaśobhinaḥ; pramāpaṇe me matir atra jāyate
GE09ram_05_u:045.027a: ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ; samāhitaś cātisahaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:045.027c: asaṃśayaṃ karmaguṇodayād ayaṃ; sanāgayakṣair munibhiś ca pūjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.028c: parākramo hy asya manāṃsi kampayet; surāsurāṇām api śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.029a: na khalv ayaṃ nābhibhaved upekṣitaḥ; parākramo hy asya raṇe vivardhate
GE09ram_05_u:045.029c: pramāpaṇaṃ tv eva mamāsya rocate; na vardhamāno 'gnir upekṣituṃ kṣamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.030a: iti pravegaṃ tu parasya tarkayan; svakarmayogaṃ ca vidhāya vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:045.030c: cakāra vegaṃ tu mahābalas tadā; matiṃ ca cakre 'sya vadhe mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.031a: sa tasya tān aṣṭahayān mahājavān; samāhitān bhārasahān vivartane
GE09ram_05_u:045.031c: jaghāna vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite; talaprahālaiḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.032a: tatas talenābhihato mahārathaḥ; sa tasya piṅgādhipamantrinirjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.032c: sa bhagnanīḍaḥ parimuktakūbaraḥ; papāta bhūmau hatavājir ambarāt
GE09ram_05_u:045.033a: sa taṃ parityajya mahāratho rathaṃ; sakārmukaḥ khaḍgadharaḥ kham utpatat
GE09ram_05_u:045.033c: tapo'bhiyogād ṛṣir ugravīryavān; vihāya dehaṃ marutām ivālayam
GE09ram_05_u:045.034a: tataḥ kapis taṃ vicarantam ambare; patatrirājānilasiddhasevite
GE09ram_05_u:045.034c: sametya taṃ mārutavegavikramaḥ; krameṇa jagrāha ca pādayor dṛḍham
GE09ram_05_u:045.035a: sa taṃ samāvidhya sahasraśaḥ kapir; mahoragaṃ gṛhya ivāṇḍajeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.035c: mumoca vegāt pitṛtulyavikramo; mahītale saṃyati vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.036a: sa bhagnabāhūrukaṭīśiro dharaḥ; kṣarann asṛn nirmathitāsthilocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.036c: sa bhinnasaṃdhiḥ pravikīrṇabandhano; hataḥ kṣitau vāyusutena rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.037a: mahākapir bhūmitale nipīḍya taṃ; cakāra rakṣo'dhipater mahad bhayam
GE09ram_05_u:045.038a: maharṣibhiś cakracarair mahāvrataiḥ; sametya bhūtaiś ca sayakṣapannagaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.038c: suraiś ca sendrair bhṛśajātavismayair; hate kumāre sa kapir nirīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:045.039a: nihatya taṃ vajrasutopamaprabhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ kṣatajopamekṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:045.039c: tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:046.001a: tatas tu rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; hanūmatākṣe nihate kumāre
GE09ram_05_u:046.001c: manaḥ samādhāya tadendrakalpaṃ; samādideśendrajitaṃ sa roṣāt
GE09ram_05_u:046.002a: tvam astravic chastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ; surāsurāṇām api śokadātā
GE09ram_05_u:046.003c: na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.005a: na te 'sty aśakyaṃ samareṣu karmaṇā; na te 'sty akāryaṃ matipūrvamantraṇe
GE09ram_05_u:046.005c: na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai; na veda yas te 'strabalaṃ balaṃ ca te
GE09ram_05_u:046.006a: mamānurūpaṃ tapaso balaṃ ca te; parākramaś cāstrabalaṃ ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:046.006c: na tvāṃ samāsādya raṇāvamarde; manaḥ śramaṃ gacchati niścitārtham
GE09ram_05_u:046.007a: nihatā iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.008a: sahodaras te dayitaḥ kumāro 'kṣaś ca sūditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.008c: na tu teṣv eva me sāro yas tvayy ariniṣūdana
GE09ram_05_u:046.009a: idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ; kapeḥ prabhāvaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:046.009c: tvam ātmanaś cāpi samīkṣya sāraṃ; kuruṣva vegaṃ svabalānurūpam
GE09ram_05_u:046.010a: balāvamardas tvayi saṃnikṛṣṭe; yathā gate śāmyati śāntaśatrau
GE09ram_05_u:046.010c: tathā samīkṣyātmabalaṃ paraṃ ca; samārabhasvāstravidāṃ variṣṭha
GE09ram_05_u:046.011a: na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:046.011c: iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā
GE09ram_05_u:046.012c: avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ kāmyaś ca vijayo raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:046.013a: tataḥ pitus tad vacanaṃ niśamya; pradakṣiṇaṃ dakṣasutaprabhāvaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.013c: cakāra bhartāram adīnasattvo; raṇāya vīraḥ pratipannabuddhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.014a: tatas taiḥ svagaṇair iṣṭair indrajit pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.016a: sa pakṣi rājopamatulyavegair; vyālaiś caturbhiḥ sitatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.017a: sa rathī dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śastrajño 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.018a: sa tasya rathanirghoṣaṃ jyāsvanaṃ kārmukasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:046.019a: sumahac cāpam ādāya śitaśalyāṃś ca sāyakān
GE09ram_05_u:046.020a: tasmiṃs tataḥ saṃyati jātaharṣe; raṇāya nirgacchati bāṇapāṇau
GE09ram_05_u:046.020c: diśaś ca sarvāḥ kaluṣā babhūvur; mṛgāś ca raudrā bahudhā vineduḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.021a: samāgatās tatra tu nāgayakṣā; maharṣayaś cakracarāś ca siddhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.021c: nabhaḥ samāvṛtya ca pakṣisaṃghā; vinedur uccaiḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.022a: āyantaṃ sarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.023a: indrajit tu rathaṃ divyam āsthitaś citrakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.024a: tataḥ sametāv atitīkṣṇavegau; mahābalau tau raṇanirviśaṅkau
GE09ram_05_u:046.024c: kapiś ca rakṣo'dhipateś ca putraḥ; surāsurendrāv iva baddhavairau
GE09ram_05_u:046.025a: sa tasya vīrasya mahārathasyā; dhanuṣmataḥ saṃyati saṃmatasya
GE09ram_05_u:046.025c: śarapravegaṃ vyahanat pravṛddhaś; cacāra mārge pitur aprameyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.027a: sa tasya tat syandananiḥsvanaṃ ca; mṛdaṅgabherīpaṭahasvanaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:046.027c: vikṛṣyamāṇasya ca kārmukasya; niśamya ghoṣaṃ punar utpapāta
GE09ram_05_u:046.031a: hanūmato veda na rākṣaso 'ntaraṃ; na mārutis tasya mahātmano 'ntaram
GE09ram_05_u:046.031c: parasparaṃ nirviṣahau babhūvatuḥ; sametya tau devasamānavikramau
GE09ram_05_u:046.032a: tatas tu lakṣye sa vihanyamāne; śareṣu mogheṣu ca saṃpatatsu
GE09ram_05_u:046.033a: tato matiṃ rākṣasarājasūnuś; cakāra tasmin harivīramukhye
GE09ram_05_u:046.033c: avadhyatāṃ tasya kapeḥ samīkṣya; kathaṃ nigacched iti nigrahārtham
GE09ram_05_u:046.034a: tataḥ paitāmahāṃ vīraḥ so 'stram astravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.036a: tena baddhas tato 'streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.036c: abhavan nirviceṣṭaś ca papāta ca mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:046.037a: tato 'tha buddhvā sa tadāstrabandhaṃ; prabhoḥ prabhāvād vigatālpavegaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.037c: pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca; vicintayām āsa haripravīraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.039a: na me 'strabandhasya ca śaktir asti; vimokṣaṇe lokaguroḥ prabhāvāt
GE09ram_05_u:046.040a: sa vīryam astrasya kapir vicārya; pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_05_u:046.041a: astreṇāpi hi baddhasya bhayaṃ mama na jāyate
GE09ram_05_u:046.042a: grahaṇe cāpi rakṣobhir mahan me guṇadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:046.042c: rākṣasendreṇa saṃvādas tasmād gṛhṇantu māṃ pare
GE09ram_05_u:046.043a: sa niścitārthaḥ paravīrahantā; samīkṣya karī vinivṛttaceṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.043c: paraiḥ prasahyābhigatair nigṛhya; nanāda tais taiḥ paribhartsyamānaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.044a: tatas taṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_05_u:046.044c: babandhuḥ śaṇavalkaiś ca drumacīraiś ca saṃhataiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.045a: sa rocayām āsa paraiś ca bandhanaṃ; prasahya vīrair abhinigrahaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:046.045c: kautūhalān māṃ yadi rākṣasendro; draṣṭuṃ vyavasyed iti niścitārthaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.046a: sa baddhas tena valkena vimukto 'streṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:046.046c: astrabandhaḥ sa cānyaṃ hi na bandham anuvartate
GE09ram_05_u:046.047a: athendrajit taṃ drumacīrabandhaṃ; vicārya vīraḥ kapisattamaṃ tam
GE09ram_05_u:046.047c: vimuktam astreṇa jagāma cintām; anyena baddho hy anuvartate 'stram
GE09ram_05_u:046.048a: aho mahat karma kṛtaṃ nirarthakaṃ; na rākṣasair mantragatir vimṛṣṭā
GE09ram_05_u:046.048c: punaś ca nāstre vihate 'stram anyat; pravartate saṃśayitāḥ sma sarve
GE09ram_05_u:046.049c: kṛṣyamāṇas tu rakṣobhis taiś ca bandhair nipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.051a: athendrajit taṃ prasamīkṣya muktam; astreṇa baddhaṃ drumacīrasūtraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.051c: vyadarśayat tatra mahābalaṃ taṃ; haripravīraṃ sagaṇāya rājñe
GE09ram_05_u:046.052a: taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ baddhaṃ kapivarottamam
GE09ram_05_u:046.053a: ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāpi kiṃ kāryaṃ ko vyapāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:046.054a: hanyatāṃ dahyatāṃ vāpi bhakṣyatām iti cāpare
GE09ram_05_u:046.055a: atītya mārgaṃ sahasā mahātmā; sa tatra rakṣo'dhipapādamūle
GE09ram_05_u:046.055c: dadarśa rājñaḥ paricāravṛddhān; gṛhaṃ mahāratnavibhūṣitaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:046.058a: sa roṣasaṃvartitatāmradṛṣṭir; daśānanas taṃ kapim anvavekṣya
GE09ram_05_u:046.058c: athopaviṣṭān kulaśīlavṛddhān; samādiśat taṃ prati mantramukhyān
GE09ram_05_u:046.059a: yathākramaṃ taiḥ sa kapiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ; kāryārtham arthasya ca mūlam ādau
GE09ram_05_u:046.059c: nivedayām āsa harīśvarasya; dūtaḥ sakāśād aham āgato 'smi
GE09ram_05_u:047.001a: tataḥ sa karmaṇā tasya vismito bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:047.012c: kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtaṃ lokaṃ caturbhir iva sāgaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:047.016c: manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:047.017a: aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:047.018a: yady adharmo na balavān syād ayaṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:047.019a: tena bibhyati khalv asmāl lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:047.019c: ayaṃ hy utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavaṃ jagat
GE09ram_05_u:047.020a: iti cintāṃ bahuvidhām akaron matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:048.001a: tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:048.003a: durātmā pṛcchyatām eṣa kutaḥ kiṃ vāsya kāraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:048.003c: vanabhaṅge ca ko 'syārtho rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjane
GE09ram_05_u:048.004a: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasto vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:048.004c: samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape
GE09ram_05_u:048.005a: yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣito rāvaṇālayam
GE09ram_05_u:048.005c: tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūd bhayaṃ vānara mokṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:048.006a: yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvaṃ yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:048.006c: cārurūpam idaṃ kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:048.007c: na hi te vānaraṃ tejo rūpamātraṃ tu vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:048.008c: anṛtaṃ vadataś cāpi durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:048.009a: atha vā yannimittas te praveśo rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_05_u:048.010c: abravīn nāsmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:048.011a: dhanadena na me sakhyaṃ viṣṇunā nāsmi coditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:048.011c: jātir eva mama tv eṣā vānaro 'ham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:048.012a: darśane rākṣasendrasya durlabhe tad idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:048.013a: tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptā balino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:048.013c: rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dehasya pratiyuddhā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:048.014a: astrapāśair na śakyo 'haṃ baddhuṃ devāsurair api
GE09ram_05_u:048.015c: vimukto aham astreṇa rākṣasais tv atipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:048.016c: śrūyatāṃ cāpi vacanaṃ mama pathyam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_05_u:049.001c: vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam
GE09ram_05_u:049.002c: rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:049.003c: dharmārthopahitaṃ vākyam iha cāmutra ca kṣamam
GE09ram_05_u:049.005a: jyeṣṭhas tasya mahābāhuḥ putraḥ priyakaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.006a: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:049.006c: rāmo nāma mahātejā dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.007a: tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā
GE09ram_05_u:049.008a: sa mārgamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ rājaputraḥ sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.010a: tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rājaputreṇa vālinam
GE09ram_05_u:049.011c: harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvā harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.012a: tāṃ harīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:049.012c: dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhaś copari cāmbare
GE09ram_05_u:049.013a: vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatrānilopamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.014a: ahaṃ tu hanumān nāma mārutasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.014c: sītāyās tu kṛte tūrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam
GE09ram_05_u:049.016a: na hi dharmaviruddheṣu bahv apāyeṣu karmasu
GE09ram_05_u:049.017c: śarāṇām agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakto devāsureṣv api
GE09ram_05_u:049.018a: na cāpi triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaś cana
GE09ram_05_u:049.018c: rāghavasya vyalīkaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_05_u:049.019a: tat trikālahitaṃ vākyaṃ dharmyam arthānubandhi ca
GE09ram_05_u:049.020a: dṛṣṭā hīyaṃ mayā devī labdhaṃ yad iha durlabham
GE09ram_05_u:049.020c: uttaraṃ karma yac cheṣaṃ nimittaṃ tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.021c: gṛhya yāṃ nābhijānāsi pañcāsyām iva pannagīm
GE09ram_05_u:049.022a: neyaṃ jarayituṃ śakyā sāsurair amarair api
GE09ram_05_u:049.024c: ātmanaḥ sāsurair devair hetus tatrāpy ayaṃ mahān
GE09ram_05_u:049.025a: sugrīvo na hi devo 'yaṃ nāsuro na ca mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.025c: na rākṣaso na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca pannagaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.026a: mānuṣo rāghavo rājan sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.027c: tad eva phalam anveti dharmaś cādharmanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.028a: prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ tāvad bhavatā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.028c: phalam asyāpy adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase
GE09ram_05_u:049.030a: kāmaṃ khalv aham apy ekaḥ savājirathakuñjarām
GE09ram_05_u:049.030c: laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktas tasyaiṣa tu viniścayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.031c: utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ sītā yais tu pradharṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:049.032a: apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.032c: na sukhaṃ prāpnuyād anyaḥ kiṃ punas tvadvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.033a: yāṃ sītety abhijānāsi yeyaṃ tiṣṭhati te vaśe
GE09ram_05_u:049.036a: sa sauṣṭhavopetam adīnavādinaḥ; kaper niśamyāpratimo 'priyaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:049.036c: daśānanaḥ kopavivṛttalocanaḥ; samādiśat tasya vadhaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.003a: taṃ rakṣo'dhipatiṃ kruddhaṃ tac ca kāryam upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:050.003c: viditvā cintayām āsa kāryaṃ kāryavidhau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.005a: rājan dharmaviruddhaṃ ca lokavṛtteś ca garhitam
GE09ram_05_u:050.005c: tava cāsadṛśaṃ vīra kaper asya pramāpaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:050.006a: asaṃśayaṃ śatrur ayaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; kṛtaṃ hy anenāpriyam aprameyam
GE09ram_05_u:050.006c: na dūtavadhyāṃ pravadanti santo; dūtasya dṛṣṭā bahavo hi daṇḍāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.007a: vairūpyām aṅgeṣu kaśābhighāto; mauṇḍyaṃ tathā lakṣmaṇasaṃnipātaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.007c: etān hi dūte pravadanti daṇḍān; vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto 'pi
GE09ram_05_u:050.008c: bhavadvidhaḥ kopavaśe hi tiṣṭhet; kopaṃ niyacchanti hi sattvavantaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.009a: na dharmavāde na ca lokavṛtte; na śāstrabuddhigrahaṇeṣu vāpi
GE09ram_05_u:050.009c: vidyeta kaś cit tava vīratulyas; tvaṃ hy uttamaḥ sarvasurāsurāṇām
GE09ram_05_u:050.010a: na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam
GE09ram_05_u:050.010c: teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.011a: sādhur vā yadi vāsādhur parair eṣa samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.011c: bruvan parārthaṃ paravān na dūto vadham arhati
GE09ram_05_u:050.012a: api cāsmin hate rājan nānyaṃ paśyāmi khecaram
GE09ram_05_u:050.012c: iha yaḥ punar āgacchet paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.013a: tasmān nāsya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE09ram_05_u:050.013c: bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:050.014a: asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyaṃ; paśyāmi yas tau nararājaputrau
GE09ram_05_u:050.015c: tvayā manonandana nairṛtānāṃ; yuddhāyatir nāśayituṃ na yuktā
GE09ram_05_u:050.016a: hitāś ca śūrāś ca samāhitāś ca; kuleṣu jātāś ca mahāguṇeṣu
GE09ram_05_u:050.016c: manasvinaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhāḥ; koṭyagraśaste subhṛtāś ca yodhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:050.017a: tad ekadeśena balasya tāvat; ke cit tavādeśakṛto 'payāntu
GE09ram_05_u:050.017c: tau rājaputrau vinigṛhya mūḍhau; pareṣu te bhāvayituṃ prabhāvam
GE09ram_05_u:051.002a: samyag uktaṃ hi bhavatā dūtavadhyā vigarhitā
GE09ram_05_u:051.002c: avaśyaṃ tu vadhād anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.003a: kapīnāṃ kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭaṃ bhavati bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:051.003c: tad asya dīpyatāṃ śīghraṃ tena dagdhena gacchatu
GE09ram_05_u:051.006c: veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlaṃ jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.007c: śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.010a: sa bhūyaḥ saṃgataiḥ krūrai rākasair harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.011a: kāmaṃ khalu na me śaktā nibadhasyāpi rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.011c: chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.012a: sarveṣām eva paryāpto rākṣasānām ahaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_05_u:051.012c: kiṃ tu rāmasya prītyarthaṃ viṣahiṣye 'ham īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:051.013a: laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhaved iti
GE09ram_05_u:051.013c: rātrau na hi sudṛṣṭā me durgakarmavidhānataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.013e: avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:051.014a: kāmaṃ bandhaiś ca me bhūyaḥ pucchasyoddīpanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:051.014c: pīḍāṃ kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me 'sti manasaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.016c: rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaś cārayanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_05_u:051.018a: saṃvṛtān bhūmibhāgāṃś ca suvibhaktāṃś ca catvarān
GE09ram_05_u:051.018c: rathyāś ca gṛhasaṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:051.019c: ghoṣayanti kapiṃ sarve cārīka iti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.020c: rākṣasyas tā virūpākṣyaḥ śaṃsur devyās tad apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:051.021a: yas tvayā kṛtasaṃvādaḥ sīte tāmramukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.024a: yady asti patiśuśrūṣā yady asti caritaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.024c: yadi cāsty ekapatnītvaṃ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.025a: yadi kaś cid anukrośas tasya mayy asti dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.025c: yadi vā bhāgyaśeṣaṃ me śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.026c: sa vijānāti dharmātmā śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.027a: yadi māṃ tārayaty āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.027c: asmād duḥkhān mahābāhuḥ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.028c: jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsann iva śivaṃ kapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.029a: dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.029c: pradīpto 'gnir ayaṃ kasmān na māṃ dahati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.030a: dṛśyate ca mahājvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam
GE09ram_05_u:051.031a: atha vā tad idaṃ vyaktaṃ yad dṛṣṭaṃ plavatā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:051.032a: yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca dhīmatha
GE09ram_05_u:051.032c: rāmārthaṃ saṃbhramas tādṛk kim agnir na kariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:051.033c: pituś ca mama sakhyena na māṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.034a: bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.036a: sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān
GE09ram_05_u:051.038c: rakṣiṇas tān punaḥ sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:051.039a: sa tān nihatvā raṇacaṇḍavikramaḥ; samīkṣamāṇaḥ punar eva laṅkām
GE09ram_05_u:052.002a: kiṃ nu khalv aviśiṣṭaṃ me kartavyam iha sāmpratam
GE09ram_05_u:052.002c: yad eṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpajananaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:052.003a: vanaṃ tāvat pramathitaṃ prakṛṣṭā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:052.004c: alpayatnena kārye 'smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:052.005a: yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:052.005c: asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:052.009a: pradīptam agniṃ pavanas teṣu veśmasu cārayat
GE09ram_05_u:052.012c: vicitrān bhavanād dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:052.013a: nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca yathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:052.013c: hanūmān rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vadhe kiṃ cin na tṛpyati
GE09ram_05_u:052.015c: dadarśa laṅkāṃ hanumān mahāmanāḥ; svayambhukopopahatām ivāvanim
GE09ram_05_u:052.016a: sa rākṣasāṃs tān subahūṃś ca hatvā; vanaṃ ca bhaṅktvā bahupādapaṃ tat
GE09ram_05_u:052.016c: visṛjya rakṣo bhavaneṣu cāgniṃ; jagāma rāmaṃ manasā mahātmā
GE09ram_05_u:053.001c: avekṣya hānumāṃl laṅkāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.002a: tasyābhūt sumahāṃs trāsaḥ kutsā cātmany ajāyata
GE09ram_05_u:053.002c: laṅkāṃ pradahatā karma kiṃsvit kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:053.003a: dhanyās te puruṣaśreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam
GE09ram_05_u:053.004a: yadi dagdhā tv iyaṃ laṅkā nūnam āryāpi jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:053.004c: dagdhā tena mayā bhartur hataṃ kāryam ajānatā
GE09ram_05_u:053.005a: yad artham ayam ārambhas tat kāryam avasāditam
GE09ram_05_u:053.005c: mayā hi dahatā laṅkāṃ na sītā parirakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:053.006a: īṣatkāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam āsīn na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.007a: vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktaṃ na hy adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:053.007c: laṅkāyāḥ kaś cid uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī
GE09ram_05_u:053.008a: yadi tad vihataṃ kāryaṃ mayā prajñāviparyayāt
GE09ram_05_u:053.009a: kim agnau nipatāmy adya āhosvid vaḍavāmukhe
GE09ram_05_u:053.010a: kathaṃ hi jīvatā śakyo mayā draṣṭuṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.011a: mayā khalu tad evedaṃ roṣadoṣāt pradarśitam
GE09ram_05_u:053.012a: dhig astu rājasaṃ bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:053.012c: īśvareṇāpi yad rāgān mayā sītā na rakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:053.013a: vinaṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ tāv ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.014a: etad eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.017c: pūram apy upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat
GE09ram_05_u:053.018a: atha vā cārusarvāṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:053.018c: na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī nāgnir agnau pravartate
GE09ram_05_u:053.019a: na hi dharmān manas tasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.021a: trayāṇāṃ bharatādīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ devatā ca yā
GE09ram_05_u:053.021c: rāmasya ca manaḥkāntā sā kathaṃ vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:053.022a: yad vā dahanakarmāyaṃ sarvatra prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.022c: na me dahati lāṅgūlaṃ katham āryāṃ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:053.023c: api sā nirdahed agniṃ na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:053.024a: sa tathā cintayaṃs tatra devyā dharmaparigraham
GE09ram_05_u:053.025a: aho khalu kṛtaṃ karma durviṣahyaṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:053.026c: jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayo 'dbhuta eva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.027a: sa nimittaiś ca dṛṣṭārthaiḥ kāraṇaiś ca mahāguṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:053.028a: tataḥ kapiḥ prāptamanorathārthas; tām akṣatāṃ rājasutāṃ viditvā
GE09ram_05_u:053.028c: pratyakṣatas tāṃ punar eva dṛṣṭvā; pratiprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra
GE09ram_05_u:054.002a: tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.003a: kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:054.004a: balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.004c: māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tasya tat sādṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:054.005a: tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.006c: niśamya hanumāṃs tasyā vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:054.007c: yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:054.010c: sālatālāśvakarṇaiś ca vaṃśaiś ca bahubhir vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:054.016a: sa tam āruhya śailendraṃ vyavardhata mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.019c: rarāsa saha tair bhūtaiḥ prāviśad vasudhātalam
GE09ram_05_u:054.019e: kampamānaiś ca śikharaiḥ patadbhir api ca drumaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.021c: siṃhānāṃ ninado bhīmo nabho bhindan sa śuśruve
GE09ram_05_u:054.024c: pīḍitaṃ taṃ nagavaraṃ tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.025a: sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:054.026c: dharaṇyāṃ samatāṃ yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.007a: praviśann abhrajālāni niṣkramaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.007c: pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca candramā iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:055.010a: sa kiṃ cid anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahāgirim
GE09ram_05_u:055.011a: niśamya nadato nādaṃ vānarās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.012c: upāmantrya harīn sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:055.013c: na hy asyākṛtakāryasya nāda evaṃvidho bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:055.014a: tasyā bāhūruvegaṃ ca ninādaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.014c: niśamya harayo hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.015a: te nagāgrān nagāgrāṇi śikharāc chikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:055.016a: te prītāḥ pādapāgreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.017c: dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:055.018a: tatas tu vegavāṃs tasya girer girinibhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.020a: parivārya ca te sarve parāṃ prītim upāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.021a: upāyanāni cādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:055.022a: vinedur muditāḥ ke cic cakruḥ kila kilāṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:055.023a: hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā
GE09ram_05_u:055.024a: sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.025a: niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_05_u:055.026a: hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān
GE09ram_05_u:055.028c: niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditā vānarā bhavan
GE09ram_05_u:055.029a: kṣveḍanty anye nadanty anye garjanty anye mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.029c: cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti cāpare
GE09ram_05_u:055.033a: sattve vīrye na te kaś cit samo vānaravidyate
GE09ram_05_u:055.033c: yad avaplutya vistīrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.034a: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāmapatnī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:055.034c: diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokaṃ sītā viyogajam
GE09ram_05_u:055.036c: darśanaṃ cāpi laṅkāyāḥ sītāyā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:055.037a: tasthau tatrāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:055.038c: mudā tadādhyāsitam unnataṃ mahan; mahīdharāgraṃ jvalitaṃ śriyābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:056.001a: tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.003a: kathaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā devī kathaṃ vā tatra vartate
GE09ram_05_u:056.003c: tasyāṃ vā sa kathaṃ vṛttaḥ krūrakarmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.004a: tattvataḥ sarvam etan naḥ prabrūhi tvaṃ mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:056.005a: yaś cārthas tatra vaktavyo gatair asmābhir ātmavān
GE09ram_05_u:056.005c: rakṣitavyaṃ ca yat tatra tad bhavān vyākarotu naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.007a: pratyakṣam eva bhavatāṃ mahendrāgrāt kham āplutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.008a: gacchataś ca hi me ghoraṃ vighnarūpam ivābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:056.009a: sthitaṃ panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnaṃ ca taṃ nagam
GE09ram_05_u:056.010c: kṛtā me manasā buddhir bhettavyo 'yaṃ mayeti ca
GE09ram_05_u:056.011a: prahataṃ ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.012a: vyavasāyaṃ ca me buddhvā sa hovāca mahāgiriḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.013a: pitṛvyaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sakhāyaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.016a: ahaṃ tu mokṣitas tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:056.017a: rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:056.018a: etac chrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.018c: kāryam āvedya tu girer uddhataṃ ca mano mama
GE09ram_05_u:056.019c: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.020c: tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ devīṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram
GE09ram_05_u:056.021a: samudramadhye sā devī vacanaṃ mām abhāṣata
GE09ram_05_u:056.021c: mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam amārair harisattamam
GE09ram_05_u:056.021e: tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitas tvaṃ cirasya me
GE09ram_05_u:056.022a: evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.023c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.024a: tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:056.026a: atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_05_u:056.026c: āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇoti me
GE09ram_05_u:056.027a: evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:056.027c: abravīn nātivarteta kaś cid eṣa varo mama
GE09ram_05_u:056.029c: tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ hrasvaṃ hy akaravaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.030c: abhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ nirgato 'haṃ tataḥ kṣaṇāt
GE09ram_05_u:056.031a: abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.032c: sukhī bhava mahābāho prītāsmi tava vānara
GE09ram_05_u:056.034a: chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_05_u:056.034c: so 'haṃ vigatavegas tu diśo daśa vilokayan
GE09ram_05_u:056.034e: na kiṃ cit tatra paśyāmi yena me 'pahṛtā gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.035a: tato me buddhir utpannā kiṃ nāma gamane mama
GE09ram_05_u:056.035c: īdṛśo vighna utpanno rūpaṃ yatra na dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:056.036a: adho bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:056.036c: tato 'drākṣam ahaṃ bhīmāṃ rākṣasīṃ salile śayām
GE09ram_05_u:056.037a: prahasya ca mahānādam ukto 'haṃ bhīmayā tayā
GE09ram_05_u:056.038c: bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me dehaṃ ciram āhāravarjitam
GE09ram_05_u:056.039a: bāḍham ity eva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratyagṛhṇām ahaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.039c: āsya pramāṇād adhikaṃ tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam
GE09ram_05_u:056.040a: tasyāś cāsyaṃ mahad bhīmaṃ vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:056.040c: na ca māṃ sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:056.043a: śṛṇomi khagatānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:056.043c: rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipraṃ hanumatā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:056.044a: tāṃ hatvā punar evāhaṃ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ smaran
GE09ram_05_u:056.044c: gatvā ca mahad adhvānaṃ paśyāmi nagamaṇḍitam
GE09ram_05_u:056.044e: dakṣiṇaṃ tīram udadher laṅkā yatra ca sā purī
GE09ram_05_u:056.045a: astaṃ dinakare yāte rakṣasāṃ nilayaṃ purīm
GE09ram_05_u:056.047a: tataḥ sītām apaśyaṃs tu rāvaṇasya niveśane
GE09ram_05_u:056.050c: tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanaṃ kadalī vanam
GE09ram_05_u:056.053a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ nārīṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:056.055c: ahaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣe pakṣīva gahane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.056a: tato rāvaṇadārāś ca rāvaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.056c: taṃ deśaṃ samanuprāptā yatra sītābhavat sthitā
GE09ram_05_u:056.057c: saṃkucyorū stanau pīnau bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:056.058c: avākśirāḥ prapatito bahu manyasva mām iti
GE09ram_05_u:056.059a: yadi cet tvaṃ tu māṃ darpān nābhinandasi garvite
GE09ram_05_u:056.060a: etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.061e: avācyaṃ vadato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava
GE09ram_05_u:056.062a: kiṃsvid vīryaṃ tavānārya yo māṃ bhartur asaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:056.063a: na tvaṃ rāmasya sadṛśo dāsye 'py asyā na yujyase
GE09ram_05_u:056.063c: yajñīyaḥ satyavāk caiva raṇaślāghī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.064a: jānakyā paruṣaṃ vākyam evam ukto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.064c: jajvāla sahasā kopāc citāstha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.065a: vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:056.065c: maithilīṃ hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhir hāhākṛtaṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:056.066a: strīṇāṃ madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.066c: varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.067a: uktaś ca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tayā sa madanārditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.067e: mayā saha ramasvādya madviśiṣṭā na jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:056.068c: sārdhaṃ prabho ramasveha sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:056.069a: tatas tābhiḥ sametābhir nārībhiḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.069c: utthāpya sahasā nīto bhavanaṃ svaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.070c: sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.071a: tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:056.071c: tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam
GE09ram_05_u:056.073a: tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.074a: tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā
GE09ram_05_u:056.075a: tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām
GE09ram_05_u:056.075c: cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.076a: saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.078a: kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava
GE09ram_05_u:056.078c: kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:056.079a: tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.079c: devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.080a: tasya māṃ viddhi bhṛtyaṃ tvaṃ hanūmantam ihāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:056.081a: idaṃ ca puruṣavyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:056.082a: tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_05_u:056.082c: rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram
GE09ram_05_u:056.083a: etac chrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:056.083c: āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavo māṃ nayatv iti
GE09ram_05_u:056.084a: praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:056.085c: prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:056.087a: uttaraṃ punar evāha niścitya manasā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:056.087c: hanūman mama vṛttāntaṃ vaktum arhasi rāghave
GE09ram_05_u:056.088a: yathā śrutvaiva nacirāt tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_05_u:056.089a: yady anyathā bhaved etad dvau māsau jīvitaṃ mama
GE09ram_05_u:056.089c: na māṃ drakṣyati kākutstho mriye sāham anāthavat
GE09ram_05_u:056.090a: tac chrutvā karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ krodho mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_05_u:056.090c: uttaraṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaśeṣam anantaram
GE09ram_05_u:056.091c: yuddhakāṅkṣī vanaṃ tac ca vināśayitum ārabhe
GE09ram_05_u:056.093a: māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.094a: rājan vanam idaṃ durgaṃ tava bhagnaṃ durātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:056.094c: vānareṇa hy avijñāya tava vīryaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:056.095c: vadham ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ yathāsau vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_05_u:056.098a: teṣāṃ tu hataśeṣā ye te gatā laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.099a: tato me buddhir utpannā caityaprāsādam ākramam
GE09ram_05_u:056.100a: tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śataṃ stambhena vai punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.100c: lalāma bhūto laṅkāyā mayā vidhvaṃsito ruṣā
GE09ram_05_u:056.103a: tac chrutvā rākṣasendras tu mantriputrān mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:056.104e: tān ahaṃ saha sainyān vai sarvān evābhyasūdayam
GE09ram_05_u:056.105a: tataḥ punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:056.105c: bahubhī rākasaiḥ sārdhaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:056.106a: taṃ tu mandodarī putraṃ kumāraṃ raṇapaṇḍitam
GE09ram_05_u:056.106c: sahasā khaṃ samutkrāntaṃ pādayoś ca gṛhītavān
GE09ram_05_u:056.107a: tam akṣam āgataṃ bhagnaṃ niśamya sa daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.107c: tata indrajitaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ sutam
GE09ram_05_u:056.108a: tasyāpy ahaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca rākṣasapuṃgavam
GE09ram_05_u:056.108c: naṣṭaujasaṃ raṇe kṛtvā paraṃ harṣam upāgamam
GE09ram_05_u:056.110a: brāhmeṇāstreṇa sa tu māṃ prabadhnāc cātivegataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.110c: rajjūbhir abhibadhnanti tato māṃ tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.111a: rāvaṇasya samīpaṃ ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan
GE09ram_05_u:056.112a: pṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāgamanaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca tad vadham
GE09ram_05_u:056.112c: tat sarvaṃ ca mayā tatra sītārtham iti jalpitam
GE09ram_05_u:056.114a: rāmadūtaṃ ca māṃ viddhi sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:056.115a: śṛṇu cāpi samādeśaṃ yad ahaṃ prabravīmi te
GE09ram_05_u:056.115c: rākṣaseśa harīśas tvāṃ vākyam āha samāhitam
GE09ram_05_u:056.117a: tena me kathitaṃ rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:056.117c: tatra sāhāyyahetor me samayaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:056.120a: tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ sarvātmanā tv iha
GE09ram_05_u:056.120c: tena prasthāpitas tubhyaṃ samīpam iha dharmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.121a: kṣipram ānīyatāṃ sītā dīyatāṃ rāghavasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:056.121c: yāvan na harayo vīrā vidhamanti balaṃ tava
GE09ram_05_u:056.122a: vānarāṇāṃ prabhavo hi na kena viditaḥ purā
GE09ram_05_u:056.122c: devatānāṃ sakāśaṃ ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.123a: iti vānararājas tvām āhety abhihito mayā
GE09ram_05_u:056.123c: mām aikṣata tato ruṣṭaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_05_u:056.125a: tato vibhīṣaṇo nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.126a: dūtavadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rājaśāstreṣu rākṣasa
GE09ram_05_u:056.128c: rākṣasān etad evādya lāṅgūlaṃ dahyatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:056.129a: tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama pucchaṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.129c: veṣṭitaṃ śaṇavalkaiś ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakais tathā
GE09ram_05_u:056.130c: tad ādīpyanta me pucchaṃ hanantaḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.131a: baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśair yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.131c: na me pīḍā bhavet kā cid didṛkṣor nagarīṃ divā
GE09ram_05_u:056.132a: tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā baddhaṃ mām agnisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:056.133a: tato 'haṃ sumahad rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.133c: vimocayitvā taṃ bandhaṃ prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.134a: āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsy asūdayam
GE09ram_05_u:056.135a: pucchena ca pradīptena tāṃ purīṃ sāṭṭagopurām
GE09ram_05_u:056.135c: dahāmy aham asaṃbhrānto yugāntāgnir iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.136a: dagdhvā laṅkāṃ punaś caiva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_05_u:056.136c: dahatā ca mayā laṅkāṃ daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.138a: tato me buddhir utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutāṃ giram
GE09ram_05_u:056.138c: punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaś ca tayā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:056.139c: sugrīvasya ca kāryārthaṃ mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:056.140a: etat sarvaṃ mayā tatra yathāvad upapāditam
GE09ram_05_u:056.140c: atra yan na kṛtaṃ śeṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:057.001a: etad ākhyānaṃ tat sarvaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:057.002c: śīlam āsādya sītāyā mama ca plavanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:057.003c: tapasā dhārayel lokān kruddhā vā nirdahed api
GE09ram_05_u:057.004c: yasya tāṃ spṛśato gātraṃ tapasā na vināśitam
GE09ram_05_u:057.005a: na tad agniśikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī
GE09ram_05_u:057.008c: pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:057.009a: anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmaṃ sarvātmanā śubhā
GE09ram_05_u:057.011a: sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:057.011c: rākṣasībhir virūpābhir dṛṣṭā hi pramadā vane
GE09ram_05_u:057.014a: tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā caiva sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_05_u:057.016a: yan na hanti daśagrīvaṃ sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:057.016c: nimittamātraṃ rāmas tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:057.017c: yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat sarvam upapādyatām
GE09ram_05_u:058.002a: asminn evaṃgate kārye bhavatāṃ ca nivedite
GE09ram_05_u:058.002c: nyāyyaṃ sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭuṃ tau pārthivātmajau
GE09ram_05_u:058.003c: tāṃ laṅkāṃ tarasā hantuṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:058.004a: kiṃ punaḥ sahito vīrair balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:058.005a: ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sasainyaṃ sapuraḥsaram
GE09ram_05_u:058.006a: brāhmam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ ca vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:058.007a: bhavatām abhyanujñāto vikramo me ruṇaddhi tam
GE09ram_05_u:058.008c: devān api raṇe hanyāt kiṃ punas tān niśācarān
GE09ram_05_u:058.009a: sāgaro 'py atiyād velāṃ mandaraḥ pracaled api
GE09ram_05_u:058.010c: alam eko vināśāya vīro vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:058.011c: mandaro 'py avaśīryeta kiṃ punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:058.015a: varotsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīṃ camūm
GE09ram_05_u:058.016c: laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:058.017a: ayuktaṃ tu vinā devīṃ dṛṣṭabadbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:058.018a: dṛṣṭā devī na cānītā iti tatra nivedanam
GE09ram_05_u:058.019a: na hi vaḥ plavate kaś cin nāpi kaś cit parākrame
GE09ram_05_u:058.020c: kim anyad atra kartavyaṃ gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:058.022a: na tāvad eṣā matir akṣamā no; yathā bhavān paśyati rājaputra
GE09ram_05_u:058.022c: yathā tu rāmasya matir niviṣṭā; tathā bhavān paśyatu kāryasiddhim
GE09ram_05_u:059.005a: rāghave cārthanirvṛttiṃ bhartuś ca paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.007a: plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.009a: yad rakṣati mahāvīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.010a: te tad vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ paramotkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.011a: tatas te vānarā hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā madhuvanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:059.012a: tataḥ kumāras tān vṛddhāñ jāmbavatpramukhān kapīn
GE09ram_05_u:059.013c: muditāś ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.014a: gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cin; nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:059.014c: patanti ke cid vicaranti ke cit; plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:059.015a: parasparaṃ ke cid upāśrayante; parasparaṃ ke cid atibruvante
GE09ram_05_u:059.015c: drumād drumaṃ ke cid abhiplavante; kṣitau nagāgrān nipatanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:059.016a: mahītalāt ke cid udīrṇavegā; mahādrumāgrāṇy abhisaṃpatante
GE09ram_05_u:059.016c: gāyantam anyaḥ prahasann upaiti; hasantam anyaḥ prahasann upaiti
GE09ram_05_u:059.017a: rudantam anyaḥ prarudann upaiti; nudantam anyaḥ praṇudann upaiti
GE09ram_05_u:059.017c: samākulaṃ tat kapisainyam āsīn; madhuprapānotkaṭa sattvaceṣṭam
GE09ram_05_u:059.017e: na cātra kaś cin na babhūva matto; na cātra kaś cin na babhūva tṛpto
GE09ram_05_u:059.018a: tato vanaṃ tat paribhakṣyamāṇaṃ; drumāṃś ca vidhvaṃsitapatrapuṣpān
GE09ram_05_u:059.018c: samīkṣya kopād dadhivaktranāmā; nivārayām āsa kapiḥ kapīṃs tān
GE09ram_05_u:059.019a: sa taiḥ pravṛddhaiḥ paribhartsyamāno; vanasya goptā harivīravṛddhaḥ
