GE09ram_05_u:059.019c: cakāra bhūyo matim ugratejā; vanasya rakṣāṃ prati vānarebhyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.020a: uvāca kāṃś cit paruṣāṇi dhṛṣṭam; asaktam anyāṃś ca talair jaghāna
GE09ram_05_u:059.020c: sametya kaiś cit kalahaṃ cakāra; tathaiva sāmnopajagāma kāṃś cit
GE09ram_05_u:059.021a: sa tair madāc cāprativārya vegair; balāc ca tenāprativāryamāṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.021c: pradharṣitas tyaktabhayaiḥ sametya; prakṛṣyate cāpy anavekṣya doṣam
GE09ram_05_u:059.022a: nakhais tudanto daśanair daśantas; talaiś ca pādaiś ca samāpnuvantaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:059.022c: madāt kapiṃ taṃ kapayaḥ samagrā; mahāvanaṃ nirviṣayaṃ ca cakruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.003c: akāryam api kartavyaṃ kim aṅga punar īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:060.004c: sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭā vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_05_u:060.005c: jagmur madhuvanaṃ yatra nadīvega iva drutam
GE09ram_05_u:060.006a: te prahṛṣṭā madhuvanaṃ pālān ākramya vīryataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.006c: atisargāc ca paṭavo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:060.007a: utpatya ca tataḥ sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.007c: tāḍayanti sma śataśaḥ saktān madhuvane tadā
GE09ram_05_u:060.008c: ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:060.009c: madhūcciṣṭena ke cic ca jaghnur anyonyam utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.010c: atyarthaṃ ca madaglānāḥ parṇāny āstīrya śerate
GE09ram_05_u:060.011c: kṣipanty api tathānyonyaṃ skhalanty api tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:060.012a: ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_05_u:060.012c: harayo madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptā mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:060.013a: ye 'py atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyā dadhimukhasya tu
GE09ram_05_u:060.013c: te 'pi tair vānarair bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhā diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.014a: jānubhiś ca prakṛṣṭāś ca devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.015c: vayaṃ ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭā devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.016a: tato dadhimukhaḥ kruddho vanapas tatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.016c: hataṃ madhuvanaṃ śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn
GE09ram_05_u:060.018c: punar vīrā madhuvanaṃ tenaiva sahitā yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.019c: samabhyadhāvad vegenā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.020a: te śilāḥ pādapāṃś cāpi pāṣāṇāṃś cāpi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.021a: te svāmivacanaṃ vīrā hṛdayeṣv avasajya tat
GE09ram_05_u:060.022a: vṛkṣasthāṃś ca talasthāṃś ca vānarān baladarpitān
GE09ram_05_u:060.022c: abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.025a: madāndhaś a na vedainam āryako 'yaṃ mameti saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.027a: sa kathaṃ cid vimuktas tair vānarair vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.028a: ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmo bhartā no yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.030a: iṣṭaṃ madhuvanaṃ hy etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.031a: sa vānarān imān sarvān madhulubdhān gatāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.032a: vadhyā hy ete durātmāno nṛpājñā paribhāvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.035a: rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:060.036a: sa nipatya mahāvīryaḥ sarvais taiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:060.037a: sa dīnavadano bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim
GE09ram_05_u:061.002a: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kasmāt tvaṃ pādayoḥ patito mama
GE09ram_05_u:061.002c: abhayaṃ te bhaved vīra satyam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:061.003a: sa tu viśvāsitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:061.004a: naivarkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā nāpi vālinā
GE09ram_05_u:061.004c: vanaṃ nisṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi bhakṣitaṃ tat tu vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.006c: nivāryamāṇās te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi
GE09ram_05_u:061.007a: ime hi saṃrabdhatarās tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.008a: tatas tair bahubhir vīrair vānarair vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.009a: pāṇibhir nihatāḥ ke cit ke cij jānubhir āhatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.009c: prakṛṣṭāś ca yathākāmaṃ devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.010a: evam ete hatāḥ śūrās tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari
GE09ram_05_u:061.010c: kṛtsnaṃ madhuvanaṃ caiva prakāmaṃ taiḥ prabhakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:061.012a: kim ayaṃ vānaro rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.012c: kaṃ cārtham abhinirdiśya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:061.013a: evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:061.014a: ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīro dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.015c: vanaṃ yathābhipannaṃ taiḥ sādhitaṃ karma vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.016a: dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:061.016c: na hy anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇo 'sya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.017c: vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:061.018a: jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadasya baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.018c: hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_05_u:061.020a: āgataiś ca praviṣṭaṃ tad yathā madhuvanaṃ hi taiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.020c: dharṣitaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtsnam upayuktaṃ ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.020e: vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālās tathā jānubhir āhatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.021a: etadartham ayaṃ prāpto vaktuṃ madhuravāg iha
GE09ram_05_u:061.022a: dṛṣṭā sītā mahābāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.022c: abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.023a: na cāpy adṛṣṭvā vaidehīṃ viśrutāḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:061.023c: vanaṃ dātta varaṃ divyaṃ dharṣayeyur vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.025a: prāhṛṣyata bhṛśaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.025c: śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ sugrīvas tu prahṛṣya ca
GE09ram_05_u:061.026a: prīto 'smi saumya yad bhuktaṃ vanaṃ taiḥ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:061.027a: icchāmi śīghraṃ hanumatpradhānān; śākhāmṛgāṃs tān mṛgarājadarpān
GE09ram_05_u:061.027c: draṣṭuṃ kṛtārthān saha rāghavābhyāṃ; śrotuṃ ca sītādhigame prayatnam
GE09ram_05_u:062.001a: sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hṛṣṭo dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.002a: sa praṇamya ca sugrīvaṃ rāghavau ca mahābalau
GE09ram_05_u:062.002c: vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūrair divam evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_05_u:062.003a: sa yathaivāgataḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva tvarito gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.003c: nipatya gaganād bhūmau tad vanaṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:062.005a: sa tān upāgamad vīro baddhvā karapuṭāñjalim
GE09ram_05_u:062.005c: uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam idaṃ hṛṣṭavad aṅgadam
GE09ram_05_u:062.006a: saumya roṣo na kartavyo yad ebhir abhivāritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.007a: yuvarājas tvam īśaś ca vanasyāsya mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:062.007c: maurkhyāt pūrvaṃ kṛto doṣas tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:062.008a: yathaiva hi pitā te 'bhūt pūrvaṃ harigaṇeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.008c: tathā tvam api sugrīvo nānyas tu harisattama
GE09ram_05_u:062.009a: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tavānagha
GE09ram_05_u:062.010c: prahṛṣṭo na tu ruṣṭo 'sau vanaṃ śrutvā pradharṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:062.011a: prahṛṣṭo māṃ pitṛvyas te sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.011c: śīghraṃ preṣaya sarvāṃs tān iti hovāca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.013c: tat kṣamaṃ neha naḥ sthātuṃ kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.014c: kiṃ śeṣaṃ gamanaṃ tatra sugrīvo yatra me guruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.015a: sarve yathā māṃ vakṣyanti sametya hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.015c: tathāsmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham
GE09ram_05_u:062.017a: bruvataś cāṅgadaś caivaṃ śrutvā vacanam avyayam
GE09ram_05_u:062.018a: evaṃ vakṣyati ko rājan prabhuḥ san vānararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:062.019a: tava cedaṃ susadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ nānyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_05_u:062.020a: sarve vayam api prāptās tatra gantuṃ kṛtakṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.020c: sa yatra harivīrāṇāṃ sugrīvaḥ patir avyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.021a: tvayā hy anuktair haribhir naiva śakyaṃ padāt padam
GE09ram_05_u:062.021c: kva cid gantuṃ hariśreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idaṃ tu te
GE09ram_05_u:062.022a: evaṃ tu vadatāṃ teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_05_u:062.022c: bāḍhaṃ gacchāma ity uktvā utpapāta mahītalāt
GE09ram_05_u:062.026a: samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.026c: nāgantum iha śakyaṃ tair atīte samaye hi naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.027a: na matsakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite
GE09ram_05_u:062.028a: yady apy akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.029c: na me madhuvanaṃ hanyād ahṛṣṭaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.030c: dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:062.030e: na hy anyaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ sādhane tadvidho bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:062.031a: hanūmati hi siddhiś ca matiś ca matisattama
GE09ram_05_u:062.031c: vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca sūrye teja iva dhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:062.032a: jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadaś ca baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.032c: hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_05_u:062.033a: mā bhūś cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃpraty amitavikrama
GE09ram_05_u:062.034a: tataḥ kila kilā śabdaṃ śuśrāvāsannam ambare
GE09ram_05_u:062.035a: tataḥ śrutvā ninādaṃ taṃ kapīnāṃ kapisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:062.036c: aṅgadaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā hanūmantaṃ ca vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:062.038a: hanūmāṃś ca mahābahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.001a: tataḥ prasravaṇaṃ śailaṃ te gatvā citrakānanam
GE09ram_05_u:063.001c: praṇamya śirasā rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:063.003c: rāme samanurāgaṃ ca yaś cāpi samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.004a: etad ākhyānti te sarve harayo rāma saṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:063.004c: vaidehīm akṣatāṃ śrutvā rāmas tūttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:063.005a: kva sītā vartate devī kathaṃ ca mayi vartate
GE09ram_05_u:063.005c: etan me sarvam ākhyāta vaidehīṃ prati vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.007a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.007c: uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sītāyā darśanaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:063.010a: tatra dṛṣṭā mayā sītā rāvaṇāntaḥpure satī
GE09ram_05_u:063.010c: saṃnyasya tvayi jīvantī rāmā rāma manoratham
GE09ram_05_u:063.011a: dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.014c: devī kathaṃ cit kākutstha tvanmanā mārgitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:063.016a: tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā devī sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_05_u:063.017a: niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktiś cāsyās tathā tvayi
GE09ram_05_u:063.018a: abhijñānaṃ ca me dattaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tavāntike
GE09ram_05_u:063.019a: vijñāpyaś ca nara vyāghro rāmo vāyusuta tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:063.019c: akhileneha yad dṛṣṭam iti mām āha jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:063.021a: eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatnarakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.022a: eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:063.022c: etaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_05_u:063.023c: ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:063.024a: iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī
GE09ram_05_u:063.025a: etad eva mayākhyātaṃ sarvaṃ rāghava yad yathā
GE09ram_05_u:063.026a: tau jātāśvāsau rājaputrau viditvā; tac cābhijñānaṃ rāghavāya pradāya
GE09ram_05_u:063.026c: devyā cākhyātaṃ sarvam evānupūrvyād; vācā saṃpūrṇaṃ vāyuputraḥ śaśaṃsa
GE09ram_05_u:064.002a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:064.003a: yathaiva dhenuḥ sravati snehād vatsasya vatsalā
GE09ram_05_u:064.004a: maṇiratnam idaṃ dattaṃ vaidehyāḥ śvaśureṇa me
GE09ram_05_u:064.004c: vadhūkāle yathā baddham adhikaṃ mūrdhni śobhate
GE09ram_05_u:064.006a: imaṃ dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ tathā tātasya darśanam
GE09ram_05_u:064.006c: adyāsmy avagataḥ saumya vaidehasya tathā vibhoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:064.007a: ayaṃ hi śobhate tasyāḥ priyāyā mūrdhni me maṇiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:064.007c: adyāsya darśanenāhaṃ prāptāṃ tām iva cintaye
GE09ram_05_u:064.008a: kim āha sītā vaidehī brūhi saumya punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:064.009a: itas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad imaṃ vārisaṃbhavam
GE09ram_05_u:064.009c: maṇiṃ paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:064.010a: ciraṃ jīvati vaidehī yadi māsaṃ dhariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:064.010c: kṣaṇaṃ saumya na jīveyaṃ vinā tām asitekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:064.011a: naya mām api taṃ deśaṃ yatra dṛṣṭā mama priyā
GE09ram_05_u:064.011c: na tiṣṭheyaṃ kṣaṇam api pravṛttim upalabhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:064.012a: kathaṃ sā mama suśroṇi bhīru bhīruḥ satī tadā
GE09ram_05_u:064.013c: āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ tasyā na virājati rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:064.014a: kim āha sītā hanumaṃs tattvataḥ kathayasva me
GE09ram_05_u:064.015a: madhurā madhurālāpā kim āha mama bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:064.015e: duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ prāpya kathaṃ jīvati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:065.001a: evam uktas tu hanumān rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:065.003a: sukhasuptā tvayā sārdhaṃ jānakī pūrvam utthitā
GE09ram_05_u:065.004a: paryāyeṇa ca suptas tvaṃ devyaṅke bharatāgraja
GE09ram_05_u:065.004c: punaś ca kila pakṣī sa devyā janayati vyathām
GE09ram_05_u:065.005a: tataḥ punar upāgamya virarāda bhṛśaṃ kila
GE09ram_05_u:065.005c: tatas tvaṃ bodhitas tasyāḥ śoṇitena samukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.006c: bodhitaḥ kila devyās tvaṃ sukhasuptaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_05_u:065.007a: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahābāho rāditāṃ ca stanāntare
GE09ram_05_u:065.008a: nakhāgraiḥ kena te bhīru dāritaṃ tu stanāntaram
GE09ram_05_u:065.009c: nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:065.010a: sutaḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.011c: vāyase tvaṃ kṛtvāḥ krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:065.012a: sa darbhaṃ saṃstarād gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.012c: sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukhaḥ khagam
GE09ram_05_u:065.013a: sa tvaṃ pradīptaṃ cikṣepa darbhaṃ taṃ vāyasaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:065.013c: tatas tu vāyasaṃ dīptaḥ sa darbho 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_05_u:065.014a: sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.015a: taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:065.016a: mogham astraṃ na śakyaṃ tu kartum ity eva rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:065.016c: tatas tasyākṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:065.017a: rāma tvāṃ sa namaskṛtvā rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:065.017c: visṛṣṭas tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam
GE09ram_05_u:065.018a: evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavāñ śīlavān api
GE09ram_05_u:065.018c: kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:065.019a: na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.019c: tava rāma mukhe sthātuṃ śaktāḥ pratisamādhitum
GE09ram_05_u:065.020a: tava vīryavataḥ kaccin mayi yady asti saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.020c: kṣipraṃ suniśitair bāṇair hanyatāṃ yudhi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.021a: bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.021c: sa kimarthaṃ naravaro na māṃ rakṣati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.022c: surāṇām api durdharṣau kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.023a: mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.023c: samarthau sahitau yan māṃ nāpekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_05_u:065.024c: punar apy aham āryāṃ tām idaṃ vacanam abruvam
GE09ram_05_u:065.025a: tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_05_u:065.026a: kathaṃ cid bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_05_u:065.026c: imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:065.028a: hatvā ca samare raudraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_05_u:065.028c: rāghavas tvāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ purīṃ nayate dhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:065.029a: yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:065.030c: muktvā vastrād dadau mahyaṃ maṇim etaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:065.031a: pratigṛhya maṇiṃ divyaṃ tava heto raghūttama
GE09ram_05_u:065.032c: vivardhamānaṃ ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:065.033c: sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_05_u:065.034a: yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:065.035a: imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:065.035c: brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu haripravīra
GE09ram_05_u:065.036a: etat tavāryā nṛparājasiṃha; sītā vacaḥ prāha viṣādapūrvam
GE09ram_05_u:065.036c: etac ca buddhvā gaditaṃ mayā tvaṃ; śraddhatsva sītāṃ kuśalāṃ samagrām
GE09ram_05_u:066.001a: athāham uttaraṃ devyā punar uktaḥ sasaṃbhramam
GE09ram_05_u:066.001c: tava snehān naravyāghra sauhāryād anumānya ca
GE09ram_05_u:066.002a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vācyo rāmo dāśarathis tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:066.002c: yathā mām āpnuyāc chīghraṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:066.003a: yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:066.003c: kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:066.004a: mama cāpy alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara
GE09ram_05_u:066.005a: gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai
GE09ram_05_u:066.005c: prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.008a: kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:066.009c: śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya vāyor vā tava vānagha
GE09ram_05_u:066.010c: kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ brūhi kāryavidāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:066.011a: kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:066.012a: balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:066.012c: vijayī svāṃ purīṃ rāmo nayet tat syād yaśaskaram
GE09ram_05_u:066.013a: yathāhaṃ tasya vīrasya vanād upadhinā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:066.013c: rakṣasā tad bhayād eva tathā nārhati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.014a: balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.014c: māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:066.015a: tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.016c: niśamyāhaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abruvam
GE09ram_05_u:066.019a: yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.019c: na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.021a: madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.021c: mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:066.022a: ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.022c: na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:066.023a: tad alaṃ paritāpena devi manyur vyapaitu te
GE09ram_05_u:066.024a: mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_05_u:066.025c: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:066.029a: tato mayā vāgbhir adīnabhāṣiṇī; śivābhir iṣṭābhir abhiprasāditā
GE09ram_05_u:066.029c: jagāma śāntiṃ mama maithilātmajā; tavāpi śokena tathābhipīḍitā
